title: Truckloads & Freight ‚Äì Free Truck Load Boards
description:
100% FREE ACCESS to 120,000+ LOADS DAILY on your smartphone.
Find freight with Truckloads! From the creators of Trucker Path comes Truckloads ‚Äì Free Loadboard.
We believe carriers should not pay to find loads - it‚Äôs just counterintuitive!
Enter your equipment type, find truck loads and call a broker - Truckloads is the only freight finder you need!

KEY FREE LOADBOARD FEATURES:
‚òÜ 120,000+ full truck loads every day
‚òÜ Broker credit scores
‚òÜ Premium loads from shippers and exclusive brokers for FREE
‚òÜ Backhaul loads ‚Äì just turn on the ‚ÄòFreight Finder‚Äô feature.
‚òÜ Push notifications to stay tuned


Search for Premium loads for FREE - Truckloads is the Load Board you don‚Äôt have to pay to use:
‚Äì Fully unlimited, nothing like on other truck load boards
‚Äì No hidden or signup fees
‚Äì No credit card or any other payment info required

FIND LOADS for:
* Dry vans  üöõ
* Reefers üöö 
* Flatbeds 
* Stepdecks 
* Power only
* and other types of trailers

Join today and get instant access to a load board to find loads from best brokers and shippers. Loads are refreshed automatically so you can view jobs across the USA. Truckloads is a great solution for owner-operators and dispatchers of small fleets.

If you are an independent owner operator looking for a trucker job this could be your solution to finding loads. Truckloads is the best Free Load Finder tool on the market.

If you are a dispatcher, you can also use Truckloads Load Board to search for freight on the web! 


Safe trucking and keep trucking!

This app use to be best now since yoi limit the search view to 5 for free or pay for service get you down to one star.

title: Find Truck Loads. Freight Load Board 123Loadboard
description:
Looking for truck loads and great trucking tools to help you succeed? 123Loadboard.com‚Äôs load board app helps professional truck drivers find loads and freight to haul throughout the U.S. and Canada. Never worry about deadheading again by easily searching through millions of truck loads found annually on 123Loadboard.com‚Äôs freight matching network.

With our reliable, powerful and secure load board app, truckers now get the great freight matching features they have come to enjoy on 123Loadboard.com - now in the palm of their hand.
 
Our load board users agree that 123Loadboard's mobile app is more user friendly compared to Trucker Path Truckloads, ITS Trucker, uShip, DAT Trucker, TruckerTools, Doft, Direct Freight and other load board apps.
 
KEY LOAD BOARD APP FEATURES TO FIND FREIGHT:
- Find loads by city, state and zip code (!)
- Search for loads by GPS (!)
- Easily find backhaul loads from your current location (!)
- Search for freight back to your home base (!)
- Call the dispatcher directly from the trucking app
- Save truck loads for future reference
- Add notes to any freight listings on the loadboard
- Hide any load that does not work for you
- Truck freight display PC*Miler Mileage, Routing and Tolls (+)
- Truck loads display Rate Check (+)
- Truck loads display Credit Scores/Ratings from eCapital and TransCredit
- MyDocs: send your documents by email or fax (*)
- Post your truck with a click of a button (**)
- Manage my trucks (**)
(!) daily complimentary searches for guest users
(*) Active members only
(**) Valid MC# required
(+) limited access for guest users; add-on required for active members
 
DISCLAIMER:
- Use of 123Loadboard.com‚Äôs mobile app constitutes your acceptance of our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
- Use of 123Loadboard.com‚Äôs mobile app is at your own risk.
- You agree that you will not use 123Loadboard.com‚Äôs mobile app while driving.
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Copyright ¬© 123Loadboard.com. All Rights Reserved. All logos and trademarks on this site are the property of their respective owners.

comments: First thing is the customer service. My representative is great. Also, being able to find a backhaul for a load is near priceless. This app also has a route calculator. Allowing to see if a load is profitable and how much.
Love the app. Gives me rate per mile, and the load alert feature is awesome! This app keeps me up to date! Very affordable for this owner operator.
Handy and dandy I have been using the app for a while it's worth every penny I am paying
Very helpful especially the profit calculator
Addie was very helpful. Great app. Many great features. Will definitely help my company makes more money.

title: Doft Free Load Board  & Truck Loads
description:
Doft Free Load Board is the best way to find truck loads for truckers, owner-operators, carriers, and dispatchers. Choose from 150,000 loads posted daily on our free loadboard. 

Just enter your pickup location, destination, and equipment type to easily find freight from the best brokers and shippers.

Carriers can just tap a button on one of our prepaid loads from direct shippers and instantly book a load, and the price you see is the price you get - no more games and back-and-forth negotiations. 

From pick up to payday, the Doft app is your best tool to book loads faster.

‚Ä¢ Free unlimited search from 150,000+ loads 
‚Ä¢ Find loads by city, state, zip code or GPS based
‚Ä¢ Searchable free load board with Local and OTR hauls
‚Ä¢ Upfront Pricing for prepaid loads from direct shippers
‚Ä¢ Instant load booking with Book Now button on prepaid loads
‚Ä¢ Submit PODs In-app
‚Ä¢ Free 1-3 Day Pay (usually takes 24 hours)
‚Ä¢ Rate check - free freight rate calculator & average market rate forecast
‚Ä¢ Fuel Surcharge Calculator
‚Ä¢ Search for loads back to your home base 
‚Ä¢ Call brokers and shippers right from the app
‚Ä¢ Recent search history

Find loads and truck freight to haul that fits your trucking business needs for any type of trailer, including: Dry Van, Reefer, Flatbed, LTL loads / Partials, Expedited freight, Power only, Stepdeck and many more.

View average industry rates to help you calculate revenues and negotiate a better offer. Rate check is updated daily with thousands of load providers and offers timely rate information.

You can also use Doft load board app to search for freight and truckloads on the web! Try it out at https://loadboard.doft.com. Just log in with the same info you use for the app.

The Doft load board app is free to use and download unlike DAT, Truckstop, 123Loadboard or other load boards. Doft doesn't charge any commissions in comparison to other apps like Uber Freight or Convoy. 

Want to make the most of Doft? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools.

comments: Like the app with the exception that booked loads aren't removed in a timely manner sometimes.
Look like it has potential. Soon as I subscribed, I started to get error messages. About to cancel my subscription soon if it continues.

App was really good now that phone updated the app crashes or wont even load when it does work tell me my internet connection sucks always have good internet either fix problems with app or I'll go elsewhere for what I need
Very cool app but you don't have any loads for sprinter vans.
Every load I called on was already booked by a carrier and no longer available for dispatch. Don't waste your money upgrading to a paid account. Useless load board/App. Uninstalled.

title: DAT Load Board for Truckers
description:
Find freight faster and easier with DAT Load Board for Truckers, the most advanced load board app for owner-operators, carriers, and dispatchers. DAT subscribers get access to nearly 1 million truckloads posted every business day on the DAT Network, all from the palm of your hand. That's more than 235 million load posts per year, with 181 million of them posted first on DAT or nowhere else.


Just log in with the same info you use for DAT Power, Express, TruckersEdge, or MembersEdge and get access to easy-to-use tools you can‚Äôt find anywhere else.

‚Ä¢ Learns how you work ‚Äì App remembers your preferences so you save time
‚Ä¢ See up to 500 results at once ‚Äì No need to thumb through pages
‚Ä¢ Save matches to call later
‚Ä¢ Sort search results by offer rate
‚Ä¢ Email alerts ‚Äì Notifications when new loads match your search
‚Ä¢ Get Me Home ‚Äì Automatically finds loads for the return trip
‚Ä¢ Broker reviews and credit scores
‚Ä¢ Spot market rates for lanes you search (depending on your DAT subscription)
‚Ä¢ Remembers lanes you recently searched
‚Ä¢ Post your truck so that brokers call you about available freight

Find truck freight that fits your business needs, no matter what type of trailer you‚Äôre pulling, including:

‚Ä¢ Dry Van
‚Ä¢ Reefer
‚Ä¢ Flatbed
‚Ä¢ LTL loads / Partials
‚Ä¢ Expedited freight
‚Ä¢ Power only
‚Ä¢ Stepdeck
‚Ä¢ ... and many more

Not already a DAT, TruckersEdge, or MembersEdge customer? Call 800.551.8847, or visit dat.com/truckloads.

comments: Apple phone is able to see the map for each job yet android does not. No way to select and copy text, means everything has to be manually typed up and searched. Come on developers... if iOS has a map, why wasn't it implemented into Android OS?

It's good..but I think it would be really cool if you guys make a column for straight through same day deliveries..so when driver's looking for loads like that they can go straight to that section..an when the broker got loads like that they will put them specific same day deliveries in that columns for carries that want them...üí°
Have had better luck on other sites but the information is great would like to see a map along with the load so can see visually were load is

How can a broker post a load and not have a phone # instead have an email then when you click to reply it does not attach the email.. Is this a joke? A phone number should be required for a posted load

Very user friendly, but DAT disabled broker review option for the carriers so that was not OK. now i really don't know who im dealing with. Because i rather drive empty than To deal with some brokers, they are rude and always want to cheat you if they get a chance.... so that was a bad move by DAT to hide broker review from carriers.

title: Load One Driver
description:
- Stay on top of all driving related tasks.
 - Keep informed of compliance status.
 - View details of trip in progress including commitment times and stop information.
 - Receive notifications of events and communications between dispatch office and driver including Omnitracs forward and return messages.
 - View estimated pay and missing paperwork with ability to scan images for submission.
 - Get information on opportunities to secure loads including maps of recent shipments and nearby trucks.

Love the app wish we could pre select loads our selves as drivers

Excellent app you don't have to be in your truck to exercise all the tools that the truck Qualcomm has because it's in the palm of your hand everywhere you go very exceptional application

title: Load Shedding Notifier
description:
"The best load shedding app by far"

This app monitors the current Eskom load shedding status and notifies you if the power is scheduled to go off in your area.

Please note:
This app currently includes schedules for ALL Eskom supplied areas (nationwide) and municipality supplied areas for Abaqulusi, Bela Bela, Broadlands Estate, Buffalo City, City of Cape Town, Drakenstein, Ekurhuleni, eMalahleni (Witbank), Emfuleni, Emnambithi (Ladysmith), eThekwini (Durban), Gamagara, Govan Mbeki, Johannesburg (City Power), Kanyamazane, Khara Hais, Kuruman, KwaDukuza (Stanger), Lephalale, Lesedi, Mangaung, Makana, Makhado, Mbombela, Midstream Estate, Midvaal, Mkhondo, Modimolle, Mogalakwena, Mogale City, Moqhaka, Msukaligwa (Ermelo), Msunduzi (Pietermaritzburg), Nelson Mandela Bay, Polokwane, Randfontein, Richard's Bay, Rustenburg, Sol Plaatje (Kimberley), Steve Tshwete (Middelburg), Tlokwe, Tshwane, uMhlathuze and Umjindi (Barberton).  New areas are added frequently, based on user requests.  To request your area to be added, please send an email to abisoft.loadshedding@gmail.com.

Key features:
‚Ä¢ Real-time Eskom load shedding status monitoring.
‚Ä¢ Power grid status monitoring.
‚Ä¢ Early warning of scheduled load shedding in your areas.
‚Ä¢ Multiple areas can be configured.
‚Ä¢ *NEW* Configure quiet times for each area.
‚Ä¢ View load shedding schedules for your areas for the following month.
‚Ä¢ Very low data usage.
‚Ä¢ Configurable alerts.
‚Ä¢ Configurable status update frequency.

Disclaimer:
abisoft is in no way linked to Eskom.  All schedules and load shedding status updates are obtained from Eskom or publicly available data sources.  This app is provided free of charge, and abisoft will not accept any liability for losses arising out of the information presented in this app.

Updates areas for Emfuleni and Randfontein
Added stage 1-8 schedules and areas for all Free State and Northern Cape municipalities
comments: UPDATE: A year down the line and this is still THE best loadshedding app hands down! And it has only been getting better and better. Thank you guys for this amazing app! Feb 2019: I find this app EXCEPTIONLY useful. always accurate. I always know what's happening with Eskom and if it will affect me. Can also see what the planned outages are for days so I can plan. I cannot recommend this app more! Try it. If you don't like it, delete it (you will like it though)

Very good and useful app. I have no complaints. One thing I've noticed which don't work on my phone is the Notification status ringtone, I saved a different sound, but when a notification arrive the app makes my default notification sound.

This app is never up to date before the load shedding shift you are going to get. Untrustworthy in terms of preparing for load shedding sessions. Times are correct 2 oit of 10 times. Seems like you guys don't learn. The point of this app is to update users. Not to tell them semthing that they already know 10 minutes adter is happens. You need to notify users beforehand. My schedule always gets switched the second the loadshedding starts. Like now, from stage 2 to 4 as it turns off. "Amazing"

Simple and usually accurate. One star originally deducted because the Eskom tweets display was showing ones from October 15 and 16 even after reinstalling; five stars now due to improvements and as the Twitter integration seems to have been fixed, as has an issue whereby on the Light theme area search results showed as white on white.

This app is so complicated and confusing not straight forward. Please give us the exact info the app says load shedding is currently on stage 4 and gives two different times stage (3) 19:00 to 21:30 and stage (4) 21:00 to 11:30 how are we suppose to know which one to follow because I was following the one in-line with stage 4 but lights went off at 19:00 which is in line with stage 3. Tomorrow I get 6 different times of load shedding so now I'm supposed to guess which one is the correct one

comments: The app is slow and clunky, also you should allow it to upload pdf files for a more efficient document handling experience. Also allow upload of more than one photo at a time. This version of the app is the worst one yet. Please listen to the users and change it for the better.

Cumbersome, not truck driver friendly, for just tracking look at project44 or maybe the not so sccurate macropoint but to me it is not easy to scrambke trough this humongous app, too much for a truck driver. KISS (keep it simple stupid)
I liked the previous version, it was better, not clouted. And what's this about straight line mileage ? We are not flying from point A to point B ! makes you look corny. Put actual truck miles

App was working fine for me until they did an update & changed the whole format to a very user unfriendly format in my opinion. Negotiations are a joke, you place a bid, they counter & whatever they say the first time they counter will not change. You'll pull it for that price or not at all. That makes it hard to justify doing business with them.
Slow to answer, no weekend coverage, on bid mode they give the same rate or less if you can get a response. Go back to the drawing board.

title: Find Truck Loads - Free Load Boards For Freight
description:
FIND THE BEST TRUCK LOADS & FREIGHT 24/7
This mobile app provides free load boards for truck freight to help carriers, dispatchers, fleet owners and owner-operators (truckers) find the best loads from live brokers and shippers. 

ComFreight is more than a freight & load finding app. It's a fully integrated freight marketplace experience that helps trucking companies find loads, track activity and get the fastest payments.

TOP LOAD BOARD FEATURES üöö
‚òÖ Search thousands of daily loads
‚òÖ Track all activity in timeline tool
‚òÖ Market average load rate data 
‚òÖ Block posters you don't like
‚òÖ See poster's days to pay
‚òÖ Load push notifications
‚òÖ Sort loads by deadhead
‚òÖ Advanced search filters
‚òÖ Real shippers & brokers
‚òÖ Fastest pay options

NEW FREIGHT RATE FEATURE

You can also use our optional freight factoring alternative that lets you get quick pay on all of your hauls. Get the fastest pay on all of your loads, even if it's a load that you did not find on this load app.

BONUS FEATURES OF OUR PAYMENTS PROGRAM üí≤

title: Load Em Up
description:
Book a load on LoadEmUp and find a suitable, safe and reliable carrier for your load. LoadEmUp supports multiple vehicle types from trailers to pickup trucks. 

Book your load with confidence, knowing that you can track it and monitor the vehicle in real time, and you also receive push notifications when the driver has changed the status of the booking.  

How to post a load in LoadEmUp 
1. Download the app for free and register your account. 
2. Choose the vehicle type and enter the details of your load. 
3. Post a load on the load board, and wait for a driver to counter/accept your offer
4. Track your load as it is being delivered to its destination. 
5. View the invoice along with pictures taken at pickup and drop off. 

New Features 
1. Negotiate with the carrier to settle for the best possible price for your load. 
2. Live track link will be send to the receiver enabling him to track the order in real time from the browser of a smartphone. 
3. Receive push notifications overtime the driver changes status to Arrived, On Trip etc. 
4. You can also login as an agent working for a corporate and negotiate with drivers for loads. 


LoadEmUp requires permission to 

GET_ACCOUNTS
As a new user, you have an option to sign-up using one of your Google accounts.

READ_SMS and RECEIVE_SMS
When signing up, LoadEmUp will auto-populate the Activation Code SMS so you don't have to enter it manually.

ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION and ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
So we can provide you accurate pick-up / drop-off suggestions, helping you to a better booking experience.

title: Ludo King‚Ñ¢
description:
*THIS IS OFFICIAL LUDO KING‚Ñ¢ GAME

300+ Million Downloads!

Ludo King‚Ñ¢ is a classic board game played between friends and family. Play the dice game of kings! Recall your childhood!

Ludo King is a cross platform multiplayer game that supports Desktop, Android, iOS and Windows mobile platform at same time. This game also support offline mode, where player can play with Computer or, Local multiplayer (play and pass mode). Ludo King is also a favorite game of Bollywood superstar. Play this dice game Ludo King. Best casual game in board games.

New Game Themes available:
Nature Theme
Egypt Theme
Disco / Night mode Theme
Pinball Theme
Candy Theme
Christmas Theme


What's new:
* New Awesome LIVE THEMES !!!
* Real chat with friends and buddies
* Make buddies worldwide
* Challenge Facebook friends/buddies
* Save/Load Ludo game option
* Player statistics with XP and level up system
* More user-friendly UI
* Support extended to low end devices

Ludo King is the modern version of the royal game of Pachisi. A Ludo game which was played between Indian kings and queens in ancient times. Roll the Ludo dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board. Beat other players, become the Ludo King.

Ludo King follows the traditional rules and the old school look of the Ludo game. Just like the kings and queens of India's golden age, your fate depends on the roll of the Ludo's dice and your strategy of moving the tokens effectively. 

Features of Ludo King:
* No internet connection required! Play against the computer.
* Play with your family and friends through Local and Online Multiplayer.
* Play 2 to 6 Player Local Multiplayer Mode.
* Invite and challenge your Facebook Friends in a private game room and beat them to become Ludo King.
* Play with world players and make them your buddies.
* Private chat with your Facebook friends & Buddies.
* Express yourself by sending emojis to your opponents. 
* Play Snake and Ladders on 7 different gameboard variations.
* Graphics with a classic look and the feel of a dice game.

Ludo King is a friends and family game that was once played by kings and now it can be enjoyed by you and your family and friends. You'll be playing this Ludo for hours and its fun for the whole family.

Ludo King is a perfect time pass game of Ludo board game. You played Ludo in your childhood, now play on your phone and tablet.

Another nostalgic game similar in structure is Snakes and Ladders. Like Ludo, you may have played this board game when you were young. Ludo King now incorporates this classic game as a whole new level. The objective of the game is simple: you start on 1 and you have to be the first one to make it to 100. However, you can only move the same number of tiles as the number you roll on a die. As the name suggests, the board is also littered with snakes and ladders. If you land on the same tile as the beginning of a ladder, then you can take the ladder as a shortcut and move on up. A game of ups and down, Snakes and Ladders has been a favorite for generations; and now you can play it too, with Ludo King. 

Ludo has different names in different regions and countries like Fia, Fia-spel (Fia the game), Le Jeu de Dada (The Game of Dada), Non t'arrabbiare, Fia med knuff (Fia with push), C·ªù c√° ng·ª±a, Uckers, Griniaris, Petits Chevaux (Little Horses), Ki nevet a v√©g√©n, ÿ®ÿ±ÿ≥Ÿä (Barjis/Barjees). People also misspell Ludo as Loodo, Chakka, Lido, Lado, Ledo, Leedo, Laado, or Lodo.

Follow us to get news and updates:
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ludokinggame
* Twitter: https://twitter.com/Ludo_King_Game
* Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/LudoKing
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ludo_king_game
* https://ludoking.com

comments: It is a good time passing game. But it has a several drawbacks like rolling of the dice is not fair secondly at the end if the two players are not together it will make them together and make a tie then one wins which is quite frastating so it is not based on luck or any kind of stratagy but simply depends on the game. It does not allow fair play. Also it gives too much ads.

Ever since the latest-update, it's setting the display-brightness to minimum. While I do love lower-brightness vis-√†-vis an average, eyes-ruining gizmo user ‚Äî but the sudden reduction in brightness even when the game is accidentally opened, particularly in an open-air surroundings: Is absolutely not-okay. Fix the darn bug pronto!

There are many ludo controllers from which people are able to controll the dice and win each and every time... Not only in local multiplayer but there are also many ludo dice controller viruses(apk) from which always some common people are only winning... Plz fix this so that no one can control any game Plz fix that ASAP so that I can change my review to 5stars

Hi developer.. Is this some kind of joke? What kind of program did you write? How can I lose all the time? And how is it possible for a particular opponent of mine to win 100 out of 100 times!! So many times I was about to win but miraculoiusly that person wins!!! Consider rewriting your program..

title: TQL Carrier Dashboard
description:
When your office is behind the wheel of a truck, finding your next load should be easy and convenient. Why? Because your time is money and hauling loads is your business.

Choose to rely on a provider that lets you focus on the road and manage your business, all through a free trucking app. Access the loads you want through a free load board, all with touch of a button. Rest easier knowing you can always depend on live support from a team of TQL experts ‚Äì 24/7/365. 

As the second largest freight broker in the U.S., TQL has invested heavily in technology designed for today‚Äôs professional truck driver. Our technology, TQL Carrier Dashboard, is available to all TQL approved contract carriers to search and quote loads, plus submit check calls and paperwork on every load. Streamlining daily tasks from your phone has never been easier. 

The benefits to your business include:   
‚Ä¢	Access to TQL‚Äôs free load board with 30,000+ available loads every week
‚Ä¢	Unlimited load board searches
‚Ä¢	Submitting quotes on the loads you want
‚Ä¢	View shipment details, including addresses, directions and load numbers 
‚Ä¢	Reduced check calls by submitting location and status updates
‚Ä¢	Faster payment processing with uploaded documents using your phone‚Äôs camera
‚Ä¢	The option to post your truck and let right load find you  
‚Ä¢	Custom filters to set your load and lane preferences
‚Ä¢	Conveniently find backhaul loads from your current location
‚Ä¢	Bi-lingual customer service 

When it comes to hauling and managing your freight, trust the technology and industry-leading customer support from TQL. 

We want to be your first choice when it comes to booking your next full truckload.

If you are new to TQL, begin the process of becoming a carrier today. Access our   Carrier Registration here or call 800.580.3101 to get started. 

Stay in touch. Follow us on Facebook at @TotalQualityLogistics  to get the latest updates on TQL technology, services and news.

comments: I thought the huge portion of the app is to eliminate check calls, but was I wrong. Went to bed at 3 am, got woken up at 0600. But when I ask why they made me install an app, they get upset & say they have a " temporary problem " with tracking. OVER A YEAR AT LEAST & still can't fix it ? I'd have it thrown away it was mine & unfixable. 2 stars only for pu / delivery info easily viewable on app.

Not a fan. I don't need an app eating data using my location services, certainly do not need notifications (using more data) every 15 minutes telling me where i am which is supposed to be used so i don't get phone calls yet still get long distance phone calls and texts for that matter from some random operator in an office somewhere. It's unfortunate our industry has surrendered to the low percentage of "truck drivers" that don't know how to do their job professionally that we require and app.
Easy to use reduce calls = nobody to wake you up . Easy to book loads and to call brokers, to put offers in or bid. Overall a simple decent app
TQL is optimal with driver focuses in mind. They don't interfere as the rest Do. Thank you TQL. Nice working with your crew. Impressed, GC.

This continuous violation of driver's privacy is outright disgusting. Broker's are not tracking the vehicles. They are tracking drivers. They do not pay for the data associated with what their apps uses, and nor do they have justifiable cause for this extreme violation of drivers privacy. They claim they won't call if the app is installed, yet they still do. They can't even provide their contact number correctly.

They told me I cannot receive load alert text messages once I install the app. I have been shut out of using load covered as a result of installing the app and they are unresponsive to my issues BAD BAD BAD BAD APP Stay clear of this app if you use load covered No way to get back to receiving text alerts. When it did work, it was pretty good but cannot reccomend anybody spend money on it at this time, will change review if it works in the future.

title: Load Em Up Driver
description:
LOADEMUP DRIVER - THE APP FOR CARRIERS  

Have a truck and ready to take a load.? Log into your carrier app and go straight to the load board.! 

Use our advanced filters to sort through a multitude of loads placed by shippers and freight brokers alike. 

Negotiate.! Using our platform you can counter and accept offers from shippers. You only settle on a price after both parties have ‚Äòaccepted‚Äô it, in other words, the load is assigned after the ‚Äòdual handshake‚Äô is complete. 


What is LoadEmUp.? 
LoadEmUp is an app which connects shippers to carriers. A shipper places his load on the load board, after which a carrier can view the details of the load. The carrier can then decide whether to accept the offer or counter it with an offer of his own. The shipper and the carrier negotiate until a price has been agreed upon by both parties and the ‚Äòdual handshake‚Äô is complete. 

After this the Load is placed in the ‚ÄòMy Jobs‚Äô page of the carrier app, and the carrier can start the load. The carrier can upload a picture of the load during pick up. Once the carrier starts the load, he can either use google maps or waze for navigation. Once a load is complete, the receiver has to sign on the app, and the carrier can upload a picture of the load on the app. After this an invoice appears and the carrier can submit, after completion of the load.

title: 123Loadboard - Find loads and truck freight BETA
description:
Looking for truck loads and great trucking tools to help you succeed? 123Loadboard's mobile app helps professional truck drivers find loads to haul throughout the US and Canada. Never worry about deadheading again by easily searching through millions of loads found annually on 123Loadboard‚Äôs freight matching network.
 
With our reliable, powerful and secure load board app, you get the great features you have come to enjoy on 123Loadboard.com - now in the palm of your hand.
 
YOUR SOURCE FOR TRUCK LOADS.
 
KEY LOAD BOARD APP FEATURES TO FIND FREIGHT:
- Find loads by city, state, zip code or GPS based*
- Easily find backhaul loads from your current location*
- Search for loads back to your home base*
- Call the dispatcher directly from the app
- Save loads for future reference
- Save searches for future reuse
- Add notes to any load
- Easily share loads 
- Favorite companies you like working with
- Hide companies that you don't like working with
- Truck loads display PC*Miler Mileage, Routing and Toll costs+
- Truck loads display Rate Check+
- Truck loads display Credit Scores from Thunder Funding and TransCredit
- My Documents: send your documents by email or fax
- Post your truck with a click of a button
* complimentary searches for guest users
+ limited access for guest users; add-on required
 
DISCLAIMER:
- Use of 123Loadboard.com‚Äôs mobile app constitutes your acceptance of our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
- Use of 123Loadboard.com‚Äôs mobile app is at your own risk.
- You agree that you will not use 123Loadboard.com‚Äôs mobile app while driving.
- Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
- Copyright ¬© 123Loadboard.com. All Rights Reserved. All logos and trademarks on this site are the property of their respective owners.

title: GCash - Buy Load, Pay Bills, Send Money
description:
Enjoy fast and easy payments and more with GCash! It's a safe, secure mobile wallet that connects to your mobile number, making it available anytime, anywhere.

‚Ä¢ Open to all networks
‚Ä¢ Zero-rated for Globe and TM
‚Ä¢ Regulated by BSP

OPEN A SAVINGS ACCOUNT WITH NO INITIAL DEPOSIT
‚Ä¢ No minimum deposit, no minimum balance
‚Ä¢ 4.1% interest rate per annum
‚Ä¢ In partnership with CIMB Bank; insured by PDIC

INVEST MONEY FOR AS LOW AS P50
‚Ä¢ Subscribe to an investment fund for as low as P50
‚Ä¢ In partnership with ATRAM Trust Corp

EXTEND YOUR BUDGET WITH GCREDIT
‚Ä¢ Gain access to GCredit, GCash's mobile credit line, based on your GScore
‚Ä¢ GCredit credit limit starts at P1,000 and can go up to P30,000
‚Ä¢ Build your GScore by using GCash frequently

HELP RESTORE PHILIPPINE FORESTS WITH GCASH FOREST
‚Ä¢ Earn green energy on GCash Forest by doing green activities
‚Ä¢ Green activities: Walking, completing cashless transactions on GCash
‚Ä¢ Get enough points so you can adopt a tree that we will plant at Ipo Watershed

BUY LOAD AND GET A 5% REBATE
‚Ä¢ Buy load for anyone on all networks
‚Ä¢ Load any Globe, TM, Smart, TNT, Sun Cellular number
‚Ä¢ Get 5% discount on every load purchase
‚Ä¢ Buy exclusive Globe and TM load combos
‚Ä¢ Buy broadband packages for Globe at Home Prepaid Wifi
‚Ä¢ Buy TV channels, PIN for Cignal and SkyCable
‚Ä¢ Buy MaxiCare prepaid health insurance

SEND MONEY IN REAL TIME FOR FREE
‚Ä¢ Send money to GCash, Coins.ph, and PayMaya users
‚Ä¢ Send any amount to multiple people at once with Ang Pao

TRANSFER MONEY TO 35+ BANKS FOR FREE
‚Ä¢ Transfer funds to any major bank account nationwide
‚Ä¢ Save bank account details for future fund transfers
‚Ä¢ Send to BPI, BDO, Metrobank, Landbank, Unionbank, Chinabank, etc

PAY BILLS AND FEES TO 350+ BILLERS
‚Ä¢ Skip long lines when you pay utility bills and more
‚Ä¢ Past due bills and paying with GCredit also accepted
‚Ä¢ Save favorite billers and set payment reminders
‚Ä¢ Electricity: Meralco, Kuryente Load, and other provincial providers 
‚Ä¢ Water: Manila Water, Maynilad, and other provincial providers 
‚Ä¢ Cable, Internet: Globe at Home, Sky Broadband, Smart Bro, etc
‚Ä¢ Telecoms: Globe Postpaid, PLDT DSL, Smart, Sun Cellular, etc
‚Ä¢ Credit Cards, Loans: BPI, BDO, Citibank, Home Credit, U-Peso, etc
‚Ä¢ Government: BIR, DFA, MMDA, NBI, SSS, Pag IBIG, etc
‚Ä¢ Travel: AirAsia, Cebu Pacific, PAL, etc
‚Ä¢ Pay real estate, insurance, travel, tuition fees, and more

RECEIVE REMITTANCES AND PAYPAL FUNDS ONLINE
‚Ä¢ Receive remittances from MoneyGram and Western Union
‚Ä¢ Just key in your reference number and receive money on your phone
‚Ä¢ Link your Paypal to GCash and withdraw or transfer funds for free

CASH-IN WITH ONLINE BANKING AND DEBIT CARDS
‚Ä¢ Top up your GCash using online banking: BPI, RCBC, Unionbank, etc
‚Ä¢ Mastercard/Visa debit card also available:  BDO, AUB, Citi, HSBC, and more
‚Ä¢ Cash in over the counter: Cebuana Lhuillier, Villarica, Touchpay, Bayad Center, 7-11, etc

SHOP ONLINE EVEN WITH NO CREDIT CARD
‚Ä¢ Easy, secure, and instant payment to Lazada, Shopee, and more

PAY QR AT OVER 70,000 PARTNERS
‚Ä¢ Scan to pay QR codes at over 70,000 GCash partners
‚Ä¢ Pay at Puregold, SM, and a ton of shops and restaurants nationwide

BUY GAMING CREDITS INSTANTLY
‚Ä¢ Buy 10 kinds of gaming pins from top brands at Php 1=1 cost
‚Ä¢ Get Garena Shells, Steam Wallet Codes, LevelUp, Blizzard, Ragnarok, GameClub Credits 
‚Ä¢ Razer Gold, Rules of Survival, Mobile Legends Diamonds, PUBG PINs available

BOOK MOVIES AND PAY INSTANTLY
‚Ä¢ Book movies at SM, Robinsons, and Ayala Malls cinemas nationwide
‚Ä¢ Reserve seats in-app and receive tickets in your email after payment
‚Ä¢ Powered by GMovies

Join our ongoing promos to get freebies! Get cashbacks, load vouchers, discounts, QR vouchers, or even treats from Jollibee, Lazada, Bonchon and more!

Now with 20 million users!

The most-downloaded mobile wallet app in PH

recentChanges: The latest version of GCash is here! To start, Lazada is now available on GCash -- you can now cash-in, shop and pay, all within our app! We also added improvements and did routine fixes to keep your app experience smooth and seamless. With GCash, #WhatCantYouDo?
comments: App is useless. Wasted two days trying to do a load transfer. Registering needed the whole process to be repeated 3 times. Then the credit cards fail to register. Just fail, no info given. I did a WU transfer to get finally balance. Then the load transfer failed. Again, no info given. Oh and the support will ALWAYS reply with the same canned response regardless of your issue. Useless.

i am 1000000% dissatisfied with this app and it's verification process. I get the same feedback when providing valid passport and information every time. 'Make sure the information is correct' and I do. Just rejection after rejection. I just want to use my paypal account on Lazada and catch some good deals. I am abroad. I even had to buy a pre-validated roaming sim. but still there is another blocker behind it.

Before, it is useful. But now after i updated this app. I cant use send money at all. I hate to say this but its really bad. I almost tried sending to another gcash user there is a pop up box saying "Sorry yor current transaction cannot push through" . Almost every hour i tried sending , still same responce im getting. Can somebody fix this. My money is stock in your app.

Before it's a five star rating for me! Easy to use. It really helps me to save time, when paying my monthly bills, shopping and buying loads. But now i can't use my Gcredit to pay, though i pay on time! Not helpful anymore üòí.. every time you are going to have a system maintenance.. I have to complain in support.. NOT WORKING AGAIN! It's been a month since the last update of Gcash. since then i haven't use the Gcredit.. It became worst üòÇ

There are monthly or annually limits in how much money you can transfer in or transfer out to CIMB. The error message that pops up doesn't tell you how much that limit is, or how much you have remaining. How am I supposed to know how much I can input? Edit: The developer replied but wasn't able to address my concern. My rating of 1 star stands. Very disappointed in this service. Do not recommend at all. Edit: tried paying today. Temporarily not available... If I could give 0 stars I would

title: Load Limits and Definitions
description:
The Certified Slings & Supply Load Limit application provides written industry standards for safe overhead lifting and rigging configurations in easy to read charts and text. Instantly know the working load limit for alloy chain, synthetic, and wire rope slings. Additionally you will be able to quickly review the vital hardware specs for shackles, hooks, eye bolts, and hoist rings. This application is a must for anyone involved with overhead lifting. 

This application takes the place of printed load limit charts popular with on-site safety directors, crane operators and rigging professionals. Additionally, a toll free number is provided, linking you to Certified Slings & Supply an award winning manufacturer of overhead lifting supplies with over 50 years of professional experience in the industry. Get the information and expertise you need to make safe and efficient lifting decisions in one easy app.

title: Direct Freight
description:
The Direct Freight Driver app lets truck drivers search more than 300K loads daily from reputable brokers & shippers on the Direct Freight network.  Users sign in with a current Direct Freight Services username and password to start searching for loads. Enjoy unlimited searches with the Direct Freight Driver app. 

Loads are updated in real time.

Search for loads by your favorite preferences: Origin, radius of origin, destination, ship date, size: full or partial, trailer type (dry van, flatbed, reefer, step deck /single drop, double drop, van + vented, curtain van).
 
Sort your results by: Age (newest), pay rate (highest), dead head (shortest), trip length (longest), origin city (A - Z), origin state (A - Z), destination city (A - Z), destination state (A - Z), trailer type, load size, weight, ship date, credit report, and company name. 

Easily post your truck, review broker and shipper credit scores, days to pay and reviews and call them directly from the app.

Direct Freight is a valuable resource for owner-operators and carriers to find and move freight.

Requirements: 
Users must have an existing current Direct Freight Services account.  Don‚Äôt have a Direct Freight account?  Start here: https://www.directfreight.com/home/user/subscribe or please contact us at 888-894-4198 or admin@directfreight.com 

Use of the Direct Freight Drive app constitutes your acceptance of our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

Please do not use this mobile application while operating your vehicle.

Copyright ¬© 2018 Direct Freight Services.  All Rights Reserved.  All logos and trademarks are property of their respective owners.

title: LoadMe Matching Trucks & Loads
description:
LoadMe is a Load Board app for the Middle East, connecting shippers and transporters in the entire GCC area and beyond. 

Load-Me.com is the first online marketplace for transporters in the Middle East. It is using the power of internet combined with GPS tracking and smart phones apps to connect efficiently load owners with available trucks in their area.

If you are a Shipper, Carrier, Freight Broker, Owner Operator, Third-Party Logistics Operator or other freight professional needing to ship or haul freight, our load board and app can help you:

- Great database: Get instant access to a large pool of live information about the available freights and trucks across Middle East.
- Instant search: Check out the most recent posts from shipping companies announcing their available trucks on different routes.
- Fast matching: Job posts from owners that need their cargo shipped right away. 
- Save time and money: Increases the efficiency of acquiring loads and sending trucks for transportation purposes. 
- Real-time availability: 24/7 trucking community of freight industry professionals looking to ship cargo in all GCC destinations and beyond.

LoadMe is the perfect app for truckers and shippers alike. Whether you are an independent trucker or a transport company, you will be accessing directly the entire Load-Me network in order to find loads for any type of trucks you have available.
LoadMe stands for ‚ÄúLoad Middle East‚Äù and currently serves all countries in the GCC area: United Arab Emirates (UAE), Saudi Arabia (KSA), Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar and also Iraq, Jordan, Syria and Yemen. Feel free to add a post searching for a truck or a load using any destination in these countries.

Load-Me helps carriers, brokers and shippers excel in the trucking industry. Whether you have some cargo you need to ship or you own trucks and need a load right now, Load-Me.com will automatically match you with the best results.

Signup today for free by downloading the app or on our website at www.load-me.com
Contact Customer Service at: +971 567.728.829 (Dubai, UAE) or at info@load-me.com.

comments: Possibly the worst app for tracking. Doesn't want to work most of the time and fairly archaic. Didn't use the other features so I don't know about them but I do know any time I tried to send a message through it, it started bouncing and flickering. Constantly kept telling me to restart tracking via text messages. I never turned it off, so...

For some reason they will not stop sending me messages to open the app while I'm running a load. Throughout my last trip I was getting one every hour or more for three days. My app was open I was tracking just like their request. But the alerts keep coming. Even when I'm trying to sleep. Just today alone in 600 miles I received 19 messages. And of course I will get more throughout the night unless I delete this thing.

Complaint I have is it's a distraction which I ignore while driving. It sends constant notifications to update. Other apps I've had to use ping your location and as long as you have GPS locator on updates itself. In this day and age of over regulation, everyone screaming about safety, hands free, no texting, which I agree with the latter three. The developers of this app did a piss poor job. By it's constant barrage of notifications it encourages distraction and should cease. Doubt anyone cares

Every time a broker uses this app and I activate it for the load tracking. I get four to five messages a day to reactivate it because it's lost signal I have used other apps in the past like macropoint that I don't have that problem with they really need to fix their app.

Constantly having to restart due to "unexpected" failures. This morning, I went on to make sure that I was being tracked and it said that the load was gone? I haven't delivered it so??? Complete waste of data space.

title: AxleLoad - determination of truck axle loads
description:
Why application:
- avoid penalties for overloading axles by calculating the load on the axles. Do not lose the client, do not give a lot of money;
- help the consignor to immediately arrange the cargo correctly before loading - no need to move the cargo after loading, this will irritate the consignor;
- load more without fear of overload - you can earn more;
- assess what the loads will be on the axles if you raise the sloth or the axle on the semi-trailer. Save on rubber or on fines.

Recommendations for working with the application:
- more accurately measure the car (dimensions and weight along the axes of an empty truck) - more precisely it will coincide with real life;
- check the serviceability of the suspension and check the tire pressure;
- if you think that there is excess weight (wheels, fuel, pallets, tools, snow), add weight to the characteristics of the truck.

Enlarge the load:
- if the goods are more than 50, then the program will slow down or even fly out. This is not correct, nothing can be done
- it will be more convenient to move the load in the truck.

Any cargo can be represented in the form of four types of geometric shapes:
- pallets of standard sizes without hanging cargo - standard parallelepipeds;
- pipes, rolls of paper or metal, cable reels ... - horizontal cylinders;
- barrels, concrete rings ... - vertical cylinders;
- non-standard pallets, equipment in boxes, etc. - parallelepipeds of any size.

What kind of cars do not have:
- container ships - will be.
- bonnet singles - will be.
- four-axle singles and four-axle semi-trailers - we can not make a calculation formula. If you know how to count and want such machines to appear in the application - write in the feedback form.
- dump trucks - there are wonderful calculations for them (link). Dump trucks - a wonderful free calculator already exists https://samosval.info/katalog-transporta/peregruz.php#KALKUL

Why the calculation in the application may not coincide with the load on the scales (text + illustration):
- inaccurate measurements of the size of the truck. All in your hands. Check the data on the Internet, or immediately take from there.
- inaccurate data on the weight of the cargo (the weight in the documents does not coincide with the real weight). Consider the weight of the package.
- inaccurate data on the weight of the truck: more / less fuel (+/- 500 kg), excess spare wheel (up to 150 kg), tools (up to 50 kg), pallets (14 kg per pallet), sticking snow (up to 2000 kg) .
- failure of the suspension (lowers the cushion, spring broke) leads to the transfer of the weight of the load from the faulty axis to the rest.
- unequal tire pressure. On the trailer axle with more pressure in the tires, the load will be greater than on the neighboring ones.
- scales are guilty: uneven ground or malicious intent, alas.

comments: The app is robust and user-friendly. The free version gives a good picture of the situation, but for a small contribution this becomes even more interesting. The multiple packages that you create in terms of center of gravity give a more accurate picture of your weight on the axes. Are the results correct? After having had a roadside check there is data for comparison and more accurate input of data regarding loading weights. This app is fairly correct in its end results. I have doubts about the 3rd axle accuracy, but is acceptable due the fact that my truck anticipate weight pressure on his wheels Four stars as it give me more insight into the real live situation
I thought this app would have a setting for kilograms (kg) and pounds (lb).

title: Western Union Netspend Prepaid
description:
More than moving money.

The Western Union¬Æ Netspend¬Æ Prepaid Mastercard¬Æ mobile app helps you take control of your money. With this powerful mobile app, you can load checks using your mobile device* and send or receive a WU¬Æ money transfer** ‚Äî all from your prepaid Card Account. 

That means it‚Äôs convenient to do things like:
- Send and receive money using WU¬Æ money transfer**
- Load checks using mobile image capture*
- View your account balance
- Track your spending
- Find the closest reload locations

Use of features is subject to card activation and identity verification. 

* Mobile Check Load is a service provided by First Century Bank, N.A. and Ingo Money, Inc., subject to the First Century Bank and Ingo Money Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policy. Approval review usually takes 3 to 5 minutes but can take up to one hour. All checks are subject to approval for funding in Ingo Money's sole discretion. Fees apply for approved Money in Minutes transactions funded to your card. Unapproved checks will not be funded to your card. Ingo Money reserves the right to recover losses resulting from illegal or fraudulent use of the Ingo Money Service. Your wireless carrier may charge a fee for message and data usage. Additional transaction fees, costs, terms and conditions may be associated with the funding and use of your card. See your Cardholder Agreement for details.

comments: I've had this card for a lil over 2yrs with no problems up until now..I had to file a dispute and it was the worse experience ever..I filed the dispute in December within 5min of a purchase I thought was legit until they tried to take 2more payments unauthorized..I had to wait over a month for them to do their investigation jus for them to deny my claim..So I'm out of $140 and no merchandise..the customer service was bad and they have no loyalty to tha ones who chose to use them..smh

So it downloaded after I downloaded the other app... This seems redundant. Ill give 3 stars now cause you are able to send and receive WU with the app and card but it's still got net spend fees and Ive not had good experiences with them. Ill be deleting after funds are gone. The fees are incredible, you spend an incredible amount in fees. The other option is spending nearly $10 a month, if you plan to use the card for anything other than online shopping, then thats the route you'll want to take

This app is junk.... I already have a activated net spend card.... I just wanted to be able to send money by western union easily.. . because the western union app is not working... Point is... I should be able to use the net spend card i already have.... Not activate and load another one...
Just wish people could see if there is things forgotten about. Get your money sent straight to your card no waiting in lines. This would be great for people who don't drive or get out like myself.
Works very well except for the fees!

What's New

The Maya Fairy has heard your wishes and has granted us a more convenient way to pay for your Meralco Bill! ‚ú® When paying your bill with PayMaya, just scan the barcode at the lower right section of your bill instead of inputting the Meralco Reference Number!

comments: One of the best apps I've ever downloaded. Very useful for financial transactions. Purchases using the app and the Mastercard is an ease. Transfering and receiving money is very fast. And, the transaction history is pretty helpful! I just hope that partnership with BDO (in terms of being able to load paymaya using the app) gets back soon.

Just randomly blocked my virtual card which still had more than 16 months left before it was supposed to expire. Tried contacting their FB customer service to inquire, but was just promptly ignored. I'll try giving them a few days to restore my account, or else I'll just use my remaining funds to purchase something, delete their app, and move on to Globe's GCash. Really disappointing since I've been using this service for years now.

Very helpful and no maintaining balance. Very convinient for students also now that our school can accept payments for tuitions through online by using paymaya. Also very convenient when you have to pay your bills specially now that most of the people around the world is under quarantine you can pay your dues at home.

I changed my rating back to 5. They fixed my purchase in Google Play Store, and finally able to get it back. The customer service are working at all. It just takes a bunch of time to reply. EDIT: I'll take my words back. My card just got blocked without a single notice? NOW I CAN'T USE IT ANYMORE. For what reason did this happen? Seems like I'm not the only one having this issue.

Used this app for years now without upgrading my account. And now paymaya suddenly blocks my online payment card number with remaining balance on it. I can only use it again if I upgrade my account which I cannot since I am still a student bearing only 1 Student ID, such a dissapointment, I am infuriated with what paymaya did. User advice, just use GCASH.

title: TruckSuvidha - Online Truck, Load, Freight Booking
description:
Trucksuvidha.com is a leading portal for the transport industry. Connecting transporters, truck drivers, customers and other related entities. Simplicity, speed and efficiency drive your business and this is our focus as well. We allow the users to share the information for expansion of services to the customers by providing the better rates and vehicles. Our service is aimed for the brokers / transporters / logistics heads / delivery heads to make the use of technology. This service will help to get the movement of the vehicle and material efficiently. 

SERVICES WE PROVIDE-

1.Post Loads: Find Posted loads and freight on our web and mobile platforms to reduce empty miles.
        1.(a) Full Load Post
        1.(b) Part Load Post 

2. Post Truck: Post your Empty Truck to geeing Loads/Freight

3. Load Board : Look All Posted Loads on our Load Board

4. Truck Board : Look All Posted Trucks on our Truck Board

5. Package - With our Package Features, You can take our Benefits of Membership Profile.

6. Distance Calculator- Easy to Calculate your Distance and track your Route.

7. We have fully operational call center to support, verify and forward the requirements.

BENEFITS TO TRANSPORTERS -

1. Get more & more customers
2. They get every information about the load on their mobile.
3. Helps them in expanding their business.
4. Helps them in providing services in a larger area.
5. They get enough time to go home and spend time with their family.
6. Provides load from new areas also.
7. They manage their work while they are not in office.

BENEFITS TO CUSTOMERS-

1. They get every information with just one click on computer or a call to trucksuvidha helpline no.
2. Less confusion as they get best deal through TruckSuvidha.com.
3. They hire only those trucks which fulfill their need at economical prices.
4. Enhances their decision making power.

BENEFITS TO TRUCK DRIVERS 

1. They get load for their return trip.
2. They get time to go home and spend time with their family.
3. Through trucksuvidha.com, they get load in their own area.
4. They get work throughout the year.
5. They get fair amount for their services.
6. TruckSuvidha.com keeps them updated about new advancements in Transport Industry. 
6. They don‚Äôt require to depend on others.

BENEFITS TO PACKERS & MOVERS

1.They get work throughout the year.
2. Provides information about the load on their mobile phone.
3. Helps them in expanding their business.
4. Provides load from new areas also.
5. They manage their work while they are not in office.

Why Choose Us
We have Strong Network of  Logistics Industry

1.Transporters/Logistics (24000+)
2.Truck Operator/Owners (25000+)
3.Packers & Movers (1500+)

Download the app to book trucks now from NCR, Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, Faridabad, Karnal, Panipat, Maharashtra, Bhiwandi, Thane, Pune, Nagpur, Rajasthan, Udaipur, Jaipur, Chittor, Kishangarh, Rajsamand, Vallabhnagar, Gujarat, Kandla, Mundra, Morbi, Gandhidham, Ahmedabad, Vadodra, Silvassa, Vapi, Dadar and Nagar Haveli, Daman and Diu, Haryana, Rohtak, Sonipat, Punjab, Ludhiana, Amritsar, Jalandhar, Sangrur, Uttarakhand, Pantnagar, Badddi, Solan, Karnataka, Bangalore, Madurai, Mangalore, West Bengal, Siliguri, Kolkata, Haldia, Tamil Nadu, Chennai, Salem, Karur, Pondicherry, Andra Pradesh, Hyderabad, Vijaywada, Vizag, Arunachal Pradesh, Itangar, Assam, Guwahati, Dispur, Bihar, Patna, Hajipur, Bhagalpur, Chhattisgarh, Raipur, Bilaspur, Raigarh, Bhilai, Goa, Panaji, Chandigarh, Himachal Pradesh, Shimla, Jammu and Kashmir, Srinagar, Jammu, Jharkhand, Ranchi, Dhanbad, Kerala, Thiruvananthapuram, Kochi, Thrissur, Ernakulam, Madya, Pradesh, Bhopal, Indore, Gwalior etc.

title: BulkLoads.com
description:
Bulkloads.com is a community of shippers, carriers, and brokers in the bulk commodity trucking industry. Our shipper members consist of logistics managers in grain, fertilizer, aggregates, feed ingredients, and all other agricultural commodities. 
Our carrier members pull a variety of trailers including hopper bottoms, walking floors, end dump trailers, belt trailers, and live floors.

title: Oversized Load Cargo Truck Simulator 2019
description:
Welcome to Truck Trailer Driver 2018 with great Lorry driving oversize cargo truck games with steering and gear gives an opportunity to drive 14 wheeler . Let‚Äôs take charge of amazing oversize cargo truck game! You have courage to drive longer cargo carryout on the offroad mountain & hilly area. It is a great test to know that how good are you behind the wheel. Practical & realistic long haul trailer oversize cargo driving missions are waiting for you. Are you ready to perform this difficult task? If yes then you are a true cargo master. But this Truck simulator is not that easy as you need to transport long trailer like Australian road trains. Road trains are truck with multiple trailers and the truck drivers were highly experienced. They have special driving license and they know exactly what they are doing. If you want to transport heavy load and want to become a cargo master than perform this cargo carryout carefully.  

This extreme Hino Oversize cargo & Loading trailer Game is a reality based game. Your duty is to transport space ships from one place to another in limited time. Avoid stones, high jumps, mountains and smacks this can destroy space ship and you will fail to transport. In this European Oversize Cargo Truck Driver 2018, first experience is to joint all the trailers and load the heavy industrial equipment, space ship to transport in actual place you have limited time to perform this duty. You will enjoy different environments like snow falls, bumpy road and dangerous hills to experience in this Transport oversize Cargo Truck. This Multi-trailer oversize cargo truck suppler is significantly not quite the same as auto driving as it requires more measure of consideration and readiness.

Drive Long Trailer Road Train in this Oversized Cargo Truck Driving Simulator 3D. This Oversize cargo Truck Parking mode will enhance your professional skills with sensible moving. So, fasten your seat belt and move towards destination within time. Drive your favorite heavy cargo truck simulator and show the driving skills as the best Space Ship Cargo Master. You will have experience many real Hino Oversize Truck Games, but this Truck oversize cargo Trailer Driver 2018 entertain you by experiencing best offroad driving trucks on tricky offroad tracks in one free 3d game. Show your best Euro Truck Driving skills in this heavy oversize cargo truck game and drive your favorite Heavy Euro Truck on different environmental tracks. The best experience of oversize load cargo trailer truck drive. Join now to transport space ship and other heavy industrial equipment.

Oversized Load Cargo Truck Simulator 2019 Features:
-Transport Space Ship Cargo Truck crash in air
-Lorry driving games with steering and gear
-Uphill rugged terrain and treacherous roads along steep hills
-Practical & realistic Long Haul Trailer Drive missions
-Joint all the trailers and load the heavy industrial equipment
-Enhance your professional skills with sensible moving
-There is also a variety of heavy truck choice is your

title: Loader Droid download manager
description:
LoaderDroid is a Download Manager tailor made for the Android platform. It supports ANY type of file for downloading: Videos, Images, Music, Applications, anything. And all this is accomplished whilst having a very small footprint on your Androids resources.

Make your downloads smart, effecient, reliable, and easy.
With a user friendly Interface in our "light" or "dark" color schemes available, and notification bar progress interface, you can download what you want (Any file type supported), when you want it (Schedule your downloads), and stay informed on your downloads progress in real time. 

Here are some of the features you can expect from LoaderDroid.


Highlights:
* Resumable Downloads (Continue your downloads from the same place it was interrupted)
* Auto pause when your connection is lost
* Auto resume when your connection reappears
* Intercepts links from your Android Browser and other applications
* You can define what connection is allowed for each link (WI-FI, 3G, etc)
* Faster downloading by splitting the download into parts
* Scheduling
* Link replacement feature for outdated links
* Stable, fast and easy to use

It solves many problems with the standard Android Browser, which is sometimes unable to download certain file types (including e-books, video streams, audio, applictions, zip files, etc.)


It may also help load video streams from your favorite websites (for example, the website doesn't natively support downloading and only displays in video player).



Just click on any downloadable link in the Android Browser and select LoaderDroid from the list of applications. Or you can share a link to LoaderDroid using the Android sharing feature.

Also you can click on the "plus" button in the action bar and enter the link manually (by typing or pasting). 

And finally you can use embedded browser into LoaderDroid, it automatically detects loadable links as soon as you click on them.

LoaderDroid makes downloading any files, however small or huge, worry free. It's just a matter of time and the available space on your SD-Card.

LoaderDroid supports resumable downloading, so don't worry if you lose your connection or pause a download halfway. LoaderDroid will resume downloading right where it left off the moment your connection is restored.

Using your Android on the go? No problem. Specify what connection you would like to use to download any file individually and rid yourself from the worries of carrier charges. Whether its Wi-Fi at home and 3G on the move, your download will auto pause when you leave your Wi-Fi and resume the moment you're back home. 

For most servers, LoaderDroid will load your download in 3 threads: Sometimes this increases downloading speed up to 3 times.

LoaderDroid was designed to be smart. It wont use any type of your Android devices resources if it's not necessary.


This application is ad-supported, if you don't like ads, you want to support the development, or have additional pro features, please buy a license key at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.zloy.android.downloader.activator



Please follow/like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/LoaderDroid



UI & Art design by Dmitry Il'chenko aka artedgecreative (http://artedgecreative.deviantart.com)

title: Netspend
description:
With the Netspend Prepaid Card, you‚Äôre in charge.

Features like direct deposit offer a convenient way to add money to your Card Account and get paid up to 2 days faster.(3) Use your card anywhere Visa(R) debit cards or Debit Mastercard(R) is accepted. And with the Netspend Mobile App(6) you can manage your account wherever you go. You‚Äôll be able to do things like:

* Load checks directly to your Card Account‚Äîjust by taking a few pictures.(4)
* Check your Card Account balance and transaction history.
* Send money to friends and family.
* Find no cost reload locations.(2)

With the Mobile App(6) it‚Äôs all at your fingertips.


(1)ID verification required.  We will ask for your name, address, date of birth, and your government ID number. We may also ask to see your driver‚Äôs license or other identifying information. Card use restrictions may apply.  See netspend.com or card order page for details. Residents of Vermont are ineligible to open a card account. 

(2)While this feature is available at no cost, certain other transaction fees and costs, terms and conditions are associated with the use of this Card. See the Cardholder Agreement. 

(3)Faster funding claim is based on a comparison of our policy of making funds available upon receipt of payment instruction versus the typical banking practice of posting funds at settlement. Fraud prevention restrictions may delay availability of funds with or without notice. Early availability of funds requires payor‚Äôs support of direct deposit and is subject to the timing of payor‚Äôs payment instruction.

(4)Mobile Check Load is a service provided by First Century Bank, N.A. and Ingo Money, Inc., subject to the First Century Bank and Ingo Money Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policy. Approval review usually takes 3 to 5 minutes but can take up to one hour. All checks are subject to approval for funding in Ingo Money‚Äôs sole discretion. Fees apply for approved Money in Minutes transactions funded to your card. Unapproved checks will not be funded to your card. Ingo Money reserves the right to recover losses resulting from illegal or fraudulent use of the Ingo Money Service. Your wireless carrier may charge a fee for message and data usage. Additional transaction fees, costs, terms and conditions may be associated with the funding and use of your card. See your Cardholder Agreement for details.

(5)Fees for bank transfers are determined by the transferor‚Äôs bank and may be charged to the transferor‚Äôs bank account by the service provider or originating bank. No cost for online or mobile Account-to-Account transfers between Netspend Cardholders; a $4.95 Account-to-Account Transfer Fee-CS Agent applies.

(6)Netspend does not charge for this service, but your wireless carrier may charge for messages or data.

The Netspend Visa Prepaid Card is issued by Axos Bank¬Æ, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank¬Æ, and Republic Bank & Trust Company, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. The Netspend Prepaid Mastercard is issued by Axos Bank, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank, and Republic Bank & Trust Company pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. Axos Bank, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank, and Republic Bank & Trust Company; Members FDIC. Please see back of your Card for its issuing bank. Netspend, a TSYS¬Æ Company, is a registered agent of Axos Bank, The Bancorp Bank, MetaBank, and Republic Bank & Trust Company. The Netspend Visa Prepaid Card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted. The Netspend Prepaid Mastercard may be used everywhere Debit Mastercard is accepted. Certain products and services may be licensed under U.S. Patent Nos. 6,000,608 and 6,189,787. Use of the Card Account is subject to activation, ID verification, and funds availability. Transaction fees, terms and conditions apply to the use and reloading of the Card Account. See Cardholder Agreement for details.
Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circles design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated.

comments: I have been with Netspend for 4 years. And for the most part been happy. But I gave 1 star due to my experience today. I got a bigger sized credit from a refund we got and all of a sudden I can't use my card or my account. Then we try to call it says the info we put in is wrong so we can't even talk to anyone. App and online pulls up and everything looks fine. This is a nightmare. All the money I have is in that account and I can't touch it. Thanks a lot! Hope ya'll get it fixed soon!

Its a great app. Especially if use the flash pay . money is sent from one card to another instantly no charge but only to other cards whose bank that NetSpend supports. This card has saved me numerous times when I needed money transferred immediately to me. Customer service was excellent handling an issue with monthly fees

I have to at least like this app since I use their prepaid card, but the "Mobile Check Load" is horrible. It's problem is that it's Autocapture doesn't capture at all. It complains that it's too dark to take a picture. Despite using a dark background, and trying to keep the phone still, and trying to find a light or nonshade to use to brighten the check, I usually have to manually take the picture. Why can't I manually take the picture to begin with? I could before the last update. Trying to use it today, I had to manually take the picture 13 times to get it accepted at all. Look, if I could afford Hollywood lighting to take a picture of a check, I probably wouldn't need a prepaid card, right? Ingo Money Inc. is very bad.

I have been with netspend for almost 3 years but most recently I can't sign into the mobile app no matter what I do I have had the same username and password forever!!! It's really frustrating and disappointing at times... other then this recent issue it's great!! Hope netspend fixes this ASAP!!!!

Just like other preload Visa's that can be used internationally. Except that sites will suddenly stop accepting and you gotta buy another one. They charge $1.50 a transaction unless u shell out $10 a month. They also have maintenance fees. I don't recommend unless no other choice. If u use with any frequency I'm sure your getting gouged in the long run.

title: Load Driver
description:
WHAT IS LOAD?
Load Africa is Pan African, on demand logistics technology platform built to enable and facilitate local and cross border movement of goods across the continent.

@Load Africa, we understand the challenges that merchants, shippers and logistics and freight companies face in facilitating intra Africa trade , which is why we are dedicated to creating new solutions innovating using on demand and sharing technology platforms to facilitate inter Africa trade .

Load Africa aims to be the largest last mile distribution and fulfilment network in Africa by creating efficiency and optimisation in underutilised assets.

title: Loadsmart Instant Loads
description:
This App allows Dispatchers and Owner-Operators in the Trucking Industry to check available Loads and instantly accept them with one tap.

Loadsmart is the first automated solution to accept loads in seconds. No phone calls, no endless negotiations - only targeted loads based on your carrier profile.

Dispatchers and Owner Operators get:
- A List of Instant Loads available for you
- User-friendly shipment details
- Clear price and accept button for a fully online experience
- One-click interaction to get loads
- Immediate rate confirmation to your email

Loadsmart's mission is to revolutionize transportation logistics. We develop cutting-edge, user-friendly technology for shippers and carriers. Our solutions help companies move freight fast, keep trucks full, and get drivers home.

title: Glycemic Index Load ‚Äì net carbs keto diet tracker
description:
Glycemic Index & Load Diet Assistant is an app that lets you easily browse, search for, and display the Glycemic Index for different foods. The application also helps in keeping a body weight and blood glucose levels measurement logs. Additionally you can access Glycemic Load and carbohydrates contents in foods. There's also a calculator of the Glycemic Load in a given serving. Knowing these values and following a low-carb diet like Montignac, Paleo, Atkins, low-GI and similar, helps avoid weight gain or obesity and lower the risk of diabetes, coronary heart and age-related health diseases.

Do you want to eat smart?

+ know good food
+ eat smart
+ follow low-carb diets or keto diets
+ control your weight
+ prevent diseases like diabetes
+ fight weight gain, overweight and obesity
+ have the Glycemic Load, Index and carbs data always at hand
+ backup or sync with other devices

The free features of the app are:

+ Glycemic Index foods tables
+ Favorite and recent food + search feature
+ Weight tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Glucose tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ BMI calculator

We keep this app free by showing ads. If you want to remove ads or utilize the other exciting features like below, you can have them for a small fee. 

+ Glycemic Load list
+ Carbohydrates content list
+ Fiber content in foods and net carbs calculator
+ Fiber content in foods and net carbs calculator
+ Meal content calculator
+ Food diary to keep track of your food, glycemic load and carbs consumption
+ Statistics with averages for daily, weekly, monthly and yearly periods
+ Beautiful charts of the GL and carbs consumption over time
+ Weight tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Future additions to the food tracker, charting and stats
+ Import/export all your data to/from cloud storage
+ No more ads!

So, do you know what you eat? Find out now! Install the app and use it to take control of your health.

GI means Glycemic Index. It is a number associated with a particular type of food to indicate the food's effect on a person's blood glucose (blood sugar) level. The number typically ranges between 50 and 100, where 100 represents pure glucose, an equivalent amount of pure glucose.

The Glycemic Load (GL) of food is a number that estimates how much the food will raise a person's blood glucose level after eating it. It can be used to apply the Glycemic Index to dieting by connecting the GI number with carbohydrates content in a given serving. It gives an estimation on how much a serving size of food is likely to increase blood-sugar levels.

Net carbs are total carbs minus fiber which is indigestible thus it is considered not to raise blood sugar levels.

BMI is used to assess health risks and body structure but does not take in consideration muscular mass so it can sometimes be inaccurate, for instance in the case of athletes or pregnant women.

Diabetes mellitus (DM), commonly known as diabetes, is a group of metabolic disorders characterized by high blood sugar levels over a prolonged period.

Hyperglycemia (also spelled hyperglycaemia or hyperglyc√¶mia), is a condition in which an excessive amount of glucose circulates in the blood plasma.

recentChanges: Fixed lag when adding new entries to the app.
comments: I love this app! I have PCOS and a low GI diet was recommended. Using this helps me keep my symptoms in check by eating low GI and GL foods. I have just started but am hoping for good results and weight loss. Only thing I would recommend is the option to change kg to lbs and grams to ounces. Thanks so much for making this diet change so easy to track!

This app is great! So helpful deciding what to eat. As a diabetic it is important to know the glycemic load of foods so having this resource at my fingertips is game changing. The only reason I did not give 5 stars was due to the units of measure. It would be nice if there were more options than ounces or grams. Cups, for example would be helpful.

This app allows me to track my blood sugar and weight and graphs it out for me. I can calculate my meals and check the GI and GL of food. I wished it let me save meals because I am a creature of habit and eat the same thing over and over. After I explored a bit I found it easy to use and for 6.00 a year it is well worth the price for the added features.

For managing blood sugar levels a proper evaluation the GL and potential insulin spikes is more beneficial than a generic GI estimate. The GL, NET CARBS, CARBS, FIBER are all features blocked until upgrading for the "premium" version of this app. For anyone managing type 2 diabetes, I found an alternative to this on the Carb Manager app. Be well ~
The app is great, things work a lil different than am used to, but i will adapt. If it allowed 12/24hr for time this would be perfect(at least for me). Keep up the great work, Worth the $.

title: Glyx: Glycemic Load & Index
description:
Glyx is a user friendly database displaying nutrition details for approximately 1000 various foods, focusing on the glycemic index, which are essential for low carb diets. Glycemic values are displayed by individual food in the summaries as well as on the detailed page for each food type, which also indicates the glycemic index. The Glyx diet is similar with the Montignac und Logi methods, which also are part of the family of low calorie diets. This app also assists diabetics to configure an optimal diet.

A summary page enables a sorting order to display nutritional values, or alternatively vitamin or mineral contents, as desired. The app can thus be used to identify foods to counteract symptoms of deficiency in nutrition. To facilitate the search, the various foods are grouped into categories, with individual buttons for direct access. The search function works either for all foods or within each category. Upon selection of an individual food, the list shows the nutrition facts and facilitates the calculation of the various values with individual quantities, as entered on top of the page next to amount.

The supported nutrients are: Energy, protein, alcohol, water, carbohydrates, sugar, starch, fiber, fats (saturated, cholesterol, poly unsaturated, mono unsaturated), vitamins (A, carotene, B1, B2, B3, B5, B9, B12, D, E), sodium, potassium, chloride, calcium, magnesium, phosphorus, iron, iodide, zinc.

Glyx is currently available in 4 languages, English, German, French and Italian and supports metric as well as imperial measurement units.

In the pipeline for future versions:
‚Ä¢	Assembling various foods to piece together an entire meal.
‚Ä¢	To save and share own menus with other users.
‚Ä¢	Rate and ranking of menus
‚Ä¢	Search for foods based on ingredients and nutritional values
‚Ä¢	Calculation of nutritional data for entire meals.
‚Ä¢	Direct comparison of foods

GuiltyBits is made up of two software developers and Glyx is the result of their efforts in their spare time. Our vision ist the creation of user friendly apps with high functionality. Your feedback will be very much appreciated and any help to improve Glyx is welcomed.

The database is provided by the Swiss Federal Food Safety and Veterinary Office http://www.naehrwertdaten.ch/request?xml=MessageData&xml=MetaData&xsl=Start&lan=en&pageKey=Start

description:
The LandstarOne app is a fast and easy way to find the best fuel stops to meet your needs along your route.
 
Users sign in using a current LandstarOnline username and password and start searching for fuel stops today!
 
Use the LandstarOne app to:
  ‚Ä¢ Search for fuel stops along your route or near any location on a map
