title: Trelleborg Load Calculator
description: With the right tire pressure, you can reduce farming variable costs by up to 20%, while improving crop protection and operation safety.  The Trelleborg Load Calculator (TLC) application identifies the precise load per axle of your tractor and the optimum tire pressure for each application, helping you increase farming efficiency.Now, you can boost your farming productivity even more with the Trelleborg TLC Plus app, in the TLC enriched premium section.TLC Plus is an advanced, sensor-based check-up system, which recommends and measures the right tire pressure according to your machine‚Äôs configuration, for any farming operation.To get started, open the TLC Plus app and select a machine from your fleet. The TLC sensors, mounted on the valves, measure the pressure and transmit the data to the app through the TLC gateway.The app then checks whether the measures correspond to the recommended pressure targets.After that, the app suggests when and where to adjust the tire pressure before carrying out your farming operations, making your fleet run safely, and more efficiently.Enter the TLC Plus world to discover more about its advanced, sensor-based features and start measuring tire pressure with your smartphone via Bluetooth today.

summary: With the right tire pressure, you can reduce farming variable costs by up to 20%
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performances improvement
comments: App is very useful and easy to use for the farmer and agricultural people in general. Through the last update it's possible to setup my tractor and farm, check the pressure of the tires, combine with a lot of configurations! I really appreciate it and suggest to download!
It wouldn't let me add tyres on my android phone so it wouldn't calculate pressure required. V annoying. Worked well on my pc so at least that was something.

title: EskomSePush - The Load Shedding App
description:
"The best load shedding app"

Get load shedding push notifications and predictions. Don't get caught out in the dark! Also use Chat to update and support your community :)

We use permissions to enable specialised features to help inform communities:
+ "Location permission" to determine your chat community 
+ "Storage permission" to enable the sharing of photos/screenshots updates
+ "Camera permission" is for a hidden torch inside the app :) You can find it on the About screen.
+ "Accounts permission" is to enable notifications on older devices.

recentChanges:
Jeff was a bietjie gatvol. He's not happy that the app rating went down from 4.5 to 3.8.

He had to pull the finger out and do something. This update solve some of the goggas:
- Solves Huawei Black screen issue!
- New areas! With new stage support!
- Loads faster!
- Better location handling!
- Easier schedule overview!
- See how many people are online!

Bonus points: Leave us a good review to make Jeff happy again :)
comments: I am changing my previous 2 star rating to 4 stars! The app has improved in leaps and bounds since I last rated it. So much more accurate and always available where I live but when I was on holiday in Hermanus, it did not pick up the area. I had to use another app for that area. I also like the inclusion of the coronavirus stats but it will help a lot more if it is updated daily.

Fantastic! Easy to use. Accurate. Up to date. The best app to have diring these trying times! Could you add an optional alarm function that allows: (1) a setting to go off at a selected time prior to load shedding in your selected area. That way you dont forget to boil a kettle or cook food! (2)a setting to go off at a selected period just before outage end time. (Allows plugging back in of appliances, just after power restoration - helpfull for 10pm to 6am outages to Prevent spike damage)

A really great app telling you what you need to know and when. Very accurate and it helps you to plan your day according to Eskom's mood swings. One thing that will earn this app 5 stars: a high level map showing the affected areas. That way you can plan your commute around the dead traffic lights. This will be really handy for people like me who have to travel through 5 areas on my way home.

Interesting app. I'm german and I use this for checking the loadshedding times of friends. :) The times are shown in the south african time zones, though the "currently loadshedding" and "no loadshedding" displays are based on the time of the phone so this always an hour late because my time zone is an hour behind south africa. And what API is being used by the app to get the information, if any? I haven't found a good source yet.

Hey Oaks! Love the App thanks for making it and letting us use it. One thought, when loadshedding happens, often some towers don't have battery backups, so no data - which means App just spins when you're loading your already added suburbs' schedules. Suggestion might be to use local storage to keep the last received schedule, stored in the app. When connected again, maybe do a call to see if the schedule is different? Also may mean less load on the servers.

title: Ding Top-up: Mobile Recharge
description:
The Ding app allows you to top-up your own phone or send load to mobiles worldwide. Mobile phone credit is known by many different terms around the globe; top-up, recharge, load, airtime, refill and more. Whatever phone credit means to you, deliver it with Ding.

Top-up mobile phones worldwide
We provide top-up to the world‚Äôs largest mobile operators.

Ding supplies mobile recharge and load to over 500 networks worldwide, making Ding the leader in international mobile top-up.

With Ding, you can send top-up to over 140 countries.

Never run out of mobile top-up
Recharge your own phone or send load to a loved one from anywhere in the world. Just choose a contact, choose a top-up amount and pay. It‚Äôs really that easy. The Ding app allows you to safely store your payment details to make topping up as easy as possible.

title: Ludo : The Dice Game
description:
Ludo is board game played with family, friends & kids.
Ludo Game is Download for Free!
Ludo is a head of board game.
Ludo game is played all ages people like kids , young and old man game.
Ludo is a Board game and Dice game
Ludo is a king of board game.
Ludo is one type of puzzle game. 
Ludo is a also known as difference name like chopat, Pacheesi   

Ludo Game plated with :-
- Play against computer
- Play with Friends (Local Multiplayer)
- Play With People around world.

The game is played between 2 to 4 players and you have the option of playing the game against the computer, against your friends, or even against people from around the world.

With plenty of features, Ludo Game brings you a really unique gaming experience.



The game and its variants are popular in many countries and under various names.
**Localized name of the game:
Mens-erger-je-niet (the Netherlands),
Parch√≠s or Parkase (Spain),
Le Jeu de Dada or Petits Chevaux (France),
Non t'arrabbiare (Italy),


Barjis(s) / Bargese (Syria),
Pach√Æs (Persia/Iran).
da' ngu'a ('Vietnam') 
Fei Xing Qi' (China)
Fia med knuff (Sweden)
Parqu√©s (Colombia)
Barjis / Bargis (Palestine)
Griniaris (Greece)

Some rules of Game :-
Each player chooses one of the 4 colours (green, yellow, red or blue) and places the 4 pieces of that colour in the corresponding starting circle. A single die is thrown to determine movement.

title: GI and glycemic load Lite
description:
This is the Lite version with all the functions. (Limit only the number of foods (5) on your list)

The nutritional values of the list are generic values it is recommended if available to detect the values on the packaging.

You can save and create your own customized list.

In your list you can update the values with those found on the (Food Packaging.) Which may vary according to the manufacturer.

You can change the Grams of your portion and see the difference in glycemic load.

From your list you can add to the dish of the day. And see the total values (GL, Carbohydrates, kcal, Proteins, Fats).

You can save the dishes of the day with Name and Date. And reuse them even changing the grams of the portions.

NB:
This application is not intended as a substitute for professional medical care. For advice, diagnosis and its treatment, please consult your doctor.

recentChanges: Added ability to save and recall the dishes of the day.
comments: Great and thorough info! Has GI, GL, option to edit number of grams of food item, and food log! Best of the high rated GI apps! Thank you!
A number of items that I double checked against reputable sites like health line give a different glycemic load than this app. Ie for quinoa
No Oats, Noodles or Water Chestnuts to name a few. Its ok but like anything use with caution and experience.

I really like this app. Very easy to use- just find your food, tap, and it brings you to the breakdown screen. The only problem is that you must use grams , and some things are better measured in tsp or tbs,which means you have to do some conversion...which,for me, means I have to go to my conversion cooking calculator to find how many grams to enter in this app to find my GL. Still, this is one of the easier apps I've come across and none of the apps has an exhaustive  food list.

The basic data is good, and uncluttered by commercial versions of foods, unlike many similar apps. The UI definitely needs work though. As an example, if you search for food and then look at the detail of one resulting item there is no way to return to the search list, you have to search all over again! I would pay for the pro version if the UI was improved.

title: Ludo Champion
description:
********  Ludo  ********   
Ludo is a strategy board game for two to four players, in which the players race their four tokens from start to finish according to the rolls of a single dice. Snakes & Ladders is an another board game.we do not have to go dig a friend to play this. 
The match includes four red, blue, green, yellow players. Is your friend the king of Ludo? The game is a simple race contest based on sheer luck, and is popular with young children. 
The game is played between 2 and 4 players and we have the option of playing against your teammates,family, friends etc.
The purpose of the game is pretty easy, Each player gets 4 tokens, this token must create a full board round and then get to the finish line. 

  ********  Snakes and Ladders  ********       
Snakes and Ladders is an ancient Indian board game regarded today as a worldwide classic. It is played between two or more players on a game-board. 
In this game, you will have to roll down the dice, in order to move to different positions on the board, wherein on the journey to the destination, you will be pulled down by snakes and raised to a higher position by a ladder.

********  Sholo Guti (16 Beads) ******** 
Sholo Guti is famous in asian countries mainly in Bangladesh, India, Pakistan, Saudi Arab, Indonesia Nepal and other.This Indian game is also
known as bagh-bakri,tiger trap or baghchal - crossing over game of tiger trap,draughts,16 gitti, Sixteen Soldiers,bagh chal, Bara Tehn or barah goti game of childhood game of two persons.
Sholo guti where 16 bead boards will be in gameplay like in checkers game. Each bead can move one step forward on the valid positions of the cort. If a player can cross a pawn of the other side then the player will achieve 1  point. In this way whoever create stategic planning & manages to achieve 16 points will be the winner. 

********  Tic Tac Toe ******** 

Tic Tac Toe is free classic puzzle game also known as 'Noughts and Crosses or sometimes X and O'.The Tic Tac Toe is a great way to pass your free time whether you're standing in a line or spending time with your kids. Stop wasting paper and save trees. Because of the simplicity of Tic Tac Toe, it is often used as a pedagogical tool for teaching the concepts of good sportsmanship and the branch of artificial intelligence.

******** Sholo Guti (16 Beads) ********
Sholo Guti is famous in asian countries mainly in Bangladesh, India, Pakistan, Saudi Arab, Indonesia Nepal and other.This Indian game is also
known as bagh-bakri,tiger trap or baghchal - crossing over game of tiger trap,draughts,16 gitti, Sixteen Soldiers,bagh chal, Bara Tehn or barah goti game of childhood game of two persons.
Sholo guti where 16 bead boards will be in gameplay like in checkers game. Each bead can move one step forward on the valid positions of the cort. If a player can cross a pawn of the other side then the player will achieve 1 point. In this way whoever create stategic planning & manages to achieve 16 points will be the winner.

******** Tic Tac Toe ********

Tic Tac Toe is free classic puzzle game also known as 'Noughts and Crosses or sometimes X and O'.The Tic Tac Toe is a great way to pass your free time whether you're standing in a line or spending time with your kids. Stop wasting paper and save trees. Because of the simplicity of Tic Tac Toe, it is often used as a pedagogical tool for teaching the concepts of good sportsmanship and the branch of artificial intelligence.
summary: Ludo:Game Of Dice, Snakes N Ladder , Sholo Guti (bead 16) , Tic Tac Toe & 1010

title: JazzCash - Money Transfer, Mobile Load & Payments
description:
Now access Pakistan‚Äôs largest mobile wallet through an app. Join millions of customers who use this wallet for simple and secure everyday banking. When it‚Äôs hard to find a moment for those small but important day to day transactions, JazzCash App is here to help. It is fast, convenient and includes built-in security technology to ensure all your data is safe and secure. Since you always have your phone on you (because who doesn‚Äôt anymore?), JazzCash App is the simplest way to do your everyday banking transactions.

With JazzCash App, we have built a different kind of bank for our customers, a bank with digital branches that are open when it suits you - 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. It is a bank where you can walk in without an appointment and walk out with a working account; debit card and all. A bank that tells you exactly what you are getting; a bank that actually puts you first. 

The all-new JazzCash App is designed keeping in mind you and your ease. It enhances the Mobile Account experience with simplified access, bringing features such as contact syncing, authenticating transactions with Touch ID or Face ID and allowing users to repeat their past transactions with one tap.

JazzCash App not only brings you convenience with a seamless user experience, it does everything you‚Äôd expect and maybe a little extra. You can use it whenever and wherever you want. You can crack on if you‚Äôre on the bus, at work, or simply can‚Äôt tear yourself away from your daily Netflix & Chill. Simply take control of your finances on the go with JazzCash App.

This revamped version of JazzCash App comes with new, innovative and cutting edge features:

‚Ä¢	Instant Account Registration: Regardless of which mobile network‚Äôs sim you use, you can now register for Mobile Account through this app
‚Ä¢	Deposit via Debit Card: Not in the mood to go to a retailer to credit your account? Now you can add money in your JazzCash App account through any debit card
‚Ä¢	Food Delivery: Hungry and want food at your doorstep? Order food from 300+ restaurants.
‚Ä¢	Bus Tickets: Book bus tickets and get amazing discounts. #SafarKaroSufferNahi 
‚Ä¢	QR Payments: Pay via QR at your favourite outlets to get amazing deals & discounts
‚Ä¢	Education Payments: Worry no more & conveniently pay education fees via JazzCash
‚Ä¢	Healthcare: Pay for your Medicines, Lab Tests & Consultation Fee through JazzCash at discounted rates
‚Ä¢	Improved Experience: Make all your Mobile Account transactions such as Send Money, Pay Bills, Mobile Load, QuickPay and Other Payments with new and improved experience!
‚Ä¢	Request Money: Out of cash in your Mobile Account or someone owes you some money? Request money from your JazzCash App
‚Ä¢	Touch ID & Face ID: Making your Mobile Account more secure without the hassle of entering an MPIN all the time by enabling Touch & Face ID on a compatible device!
‚Ä¢	Repeat Activity: If you are tired of punching in lengthy digits each time for your frequent transaction, JazzCash solves this problem for you with Repeat function for all your past transactions
‚Ä¢	Invite& Earn: Invite your friends to JazzCash app and earn cash rewards each time your friend successfully registers on the app
‚Ä¢	Locate Nearby Agent: Locate your nearby JazzCash Agent for Cash Deposit

Follow our social media accounts to be in the loop about our current and upcoming amazing offers and updates.
Facebook: facebook.com/JazzCash
Twitter: twitter.com/JazzCash
For feedback and suggestions, feel free to write to us at: jazzcashappfeedback@gmail.com

Use JazzCash App for all your payment needs and never carry a physical wallet or juggle with hard cash again!

comments: I find nothing wrong with the Brink's prepaid card. It's not the card for me& it's unfortunate. I was not informed from the commercial, that a few things were unavailable for my needs. I'm not clear on this. But I'm unable to put money on my card and the ATM for withdrawal are scarce in Brooklyn NY. However this may not be the same for everyone. Call before you commit to anything. And I'm going to email them to see what is this issue. But it just may not be the right fit.

Signed up for the card and got the app but it says it's going to send a code and I never get one. I've tried 4 times over the last hour and there's no code. I've rechecked to make sure my email address is correct. Edit: finally got a code but they expire in 5 minutes and I got it 15 minutes after requesting. Trying 1 more time.

It is a good card to have but since my account was upgraded to this new account and got a new card the places where I was able to load my card now I can't and they still have not made cards with chips in them yet and when you call customer services all you get is people that barley understand English what the F is this world coming to

Great Banking service! They monitor your account for Fraud Protection and I so appreciate that! I also like getting my check early. The only complaint is I wish it would register like main banking I try to get loans etc and it's hard because it's pre paid even tho I have their all access account which is different. Other than that Brinks is a good Banking tool! Thanks Brinks for protecting me from frauds you caught a couple for me and locked my account! I appreciate that

It's a card I can put my money on but I can't deposit checks or western union money order checks. Because theres no branch I can't even use an atm. I've only ever was able to do it once and it's been years since, aside from payroll direct deposits. Last time I tried to deposit a check their ingo thing they use deactivated my account. Never really understood the reasons considering I've had this account for years and have only ever used the app for it once.

description: Trucker Path provides truckers with vital information while on the road. Whether it‚Äôs truck stops, truck GPS, parking and rest areas, fuel prices, weigh station status, and optimized routing, our app drives the trucking community with up-to-date information. recentChanges:
We heard your concerns! We‚Äòre bringing you updates to Trucker Path for a better app experience!

**New COVID-19 Update**
Added a new virus tracker so you can follow the latest outbreak numbers and relevant news articles directly within the app

1. Ability to add multiple stops to your trip
2. Receive push notifications for new updates on Weigh Stations that you've "Followed"

comments: Use to be a really helpful app. But now just nothing but advertisements. You have to be careful when selecting something on the screen, as you will hit one of the many ads and it will switch to your browser. Also when searching for specific truck stops or other stops, it will show places that are not in your search criteria. So I'm guessing these places pay to automatically show up on a search no matter what. And the worst part are hotels. It will show hotels that don't have truck parking.

Overall it was a decent app. Now if you don't want Premium you'll get enough ad's to choke a Lit Lizard 3 times over! I think focusing on correcting the location directions (40% no exit #'s). Dump the ELD part, since there's already too many. And I wouldn't pay $10 or $30 a month for information I can find on a free app from the Truck stops apps. Or even Google if you search within a route it will locate a Travel center along your trip.

Absolutely horrible. Was good. Now there are full screen ads. Ads that play video. This p.o.s. is trying to make me lose my license - playing video pop up ads! Close one then another and another come up. Ads are also taking up screen space on the map display. I had been using/contributing to this crowd source app for 3 years. Uninstalled today. The money grubbing p.o.s. has forgotten that people who freely contribute information made this app worth using.

This USED TO BE my TO-GO APP, recommend it to everyone, NOT ANYMORE!! NOW this App has become inundated with useless, annoying ads that hijack your entire screen. If you want to open a rest stop to see details, it demands that you watch a video ad. It's USELESS TO ME NOW, time to find something else that actually helps me, and doesn't want me to pay to stop nuisance. Especially when the parking, and scale updates are provided by other users, which was the reason I USED TO LIKE THE APP.

The app was reasonably convenient until the most recent update which has it jumping to ads including video and sound. Personally i dont think its worth paying for as the information it provides is available free from other sources and the addition of video adds really cuts back on the convenience. That being said if you dont mind the ads or are willing to pay for the app it works well enough.

BUY EASILY

comments: Their support team is the worst. I'm a registered user for many months and have had to go through the verification process countless times because, although the app and website say I am fully verified, they apparently messed something up and I'm not, for some weird reason. They don't solve it, they simply stop responding... I've sent multiple tickets and they respond once or twice with pre-written stuff and then just ignore you. Very, very disappointed.

I dont know why but for some reason the app will just flash but closes. I have no idea why? I have tried everything from unistalling to clearing cache, and force stop etc. This has never happened before. I called customer service and they said that it has too do with the API on coinbase but thay didn't work, so when i tried contacting them the person got mad, and asked me for my email 5 times, and my phone number over and over. Still not fixed when my wife downloaded the app she had no issues?

Even after multiple attempts I never got the sms to confirm signup. They now have an email address, a phone number and a password. If I now move on to another wallet someone there might use that data to take over the new wallet I use. Not saying this will definitely happen but that is now possible where before it wasn't. Obviously I'll use another password but we all know some people won't. They deal with people's money and can't even get security right? Dangerous app. Stay away!

Update: you advertise all sorts of free money if you sign up and learn about the different currency's. However, most are ended. And those still going out you on a wait list that can take years. How is this not false advertising? App works well enough. However, coinbase fees are high and it takes way to long to process a transaction. As in days!!! I am unable to do any trading due to pending transaction.

The app is sub par and they have absolutely horrible support. I have opened three separate tickets with their support staff and my issue isn't even fixed yet. Every time I opened a new ticket they gave me some blanket response that does NOT resolve my issue. Then they close the ticket without checking if my issue was resolved. The worst experience I have had with any crypto company by far. If you aren't on coinbase pro they couldn't care less.

title: Ludo All Star - Online Fun Dice & Board Game
description:
Ludo is an online strategy board game for two to four players & dice game that will revive your childhood memories. Ludo is a board game played between friends, family & kids. 

Ludo game, a simpler version of another Indian cross and circle game called Chopat, Chaupur, Pachisi or Parcheesi is a classic strategy board & dice game played by 2 or 4 players. Players roll a dice and race their four tokens from start to finish according to the dice roll.
 
Along with the usual gameplay, all new online ludo games, Ludo All Star has come up with an interesting twist that will make you a lodo king game.

The game also has a Raid Mode, which makes the lado star game more interesting.
Get ready for the toughest battle with the ludo Online game against three friends of you with the most classic board game. 

Classic Ludo game is also going by different names & variations in different regions like ‡§≤‡•Ç‡§°‡•ã,Uckers, Griniaris, Fia, C·ªù c√° ng·ª±a, Petits Chevaux (Little Horses),Ki nevet a v√©g√©n, ÿ®ÿ±ÿ≥Ÿä (Barjis/Barjees),Fei Xing Qi' (China),Parqu√©s (Colombia),Barjis / Bargis (Palestine),Griniaris (Greece),Mens-erger-je-niet (the Netherlands),Parch√≠s or Parkase (Spain),Le Jeu de Dada,Barjis(s) / Bargese (Syria),Pach√Æs (Persia/Iran),da' ngu'a ('Vietnam'),ludo chakka ( indian village),Parqu√©s (Colombia),ƒë√° ng·ª±a (Vietnam),Fei Xing Qi' (China),Parcheesi (North America),Parch√≠s (Spain),Mensch √§rgere Dich nicht (Germany),Non t'arrabbiare (Italy),Chi≈Ñczyk (Poland),Reis √ºmber maailma (Estonia),Fia-spel or Fia med knuff (Sweden),Ki nevet a v√©g√©n (Hungary),Parx√≠s (Catalonia).
 
Generally confused with other classic strategy board games like Pachisi, Parcheesi, Trouble, Sorry, & Aeroplane Chess, Ludo games are much easier to understand & play. So, get on board and start your Ludo club adventure with Ludo All Star right now, and be a Ludo star!
 
Ludo All Star Highlights:
* Regular & Arabic theme
* Play online ludoo game in 2 player & 4 player modes
* Play offline, Raid Mode, etc.
* Undo your dice roll and be the lodo master of your own luck
* Roll first after a 6, and then select tokens to apply the rolls too.
* Chat & make friends
* Get lucky daily with a daily spin wheel
* Earn coins by winning ludo games. Looking the more you win, the more you earn.
 
Rules of Ludo Games
Players take turns to roll the dice in lodo game. A player will have to roll a 6 before he or she is able to navigate a colored piece from its starting point to the starting square in lodoking. After that, in each of the subsequent turns the player navigates a piece forward for one to six squares as indicated by the dice roll.
 
When a 6 is rolled, the player may choose to advance a token already in play lodo star online or may enter another staged token to its starting square. Rolling a 6 earns the player an additional or "bonus" roll in that turn. If the bonus roll results in a 6 again, the player earns an additional bonus roll in ledo games. If the third roll is also a 6, the player must forfeit his/her turn which then passes to the next player.
 
When a piece has navigated the ledo board, it proceeds up the home column. A piece can only be moved onto the home pocket by an exact roll. The first player to move all 4 pieces into the home pocket wins.
 
Get ready for the crazy adventure Ludo All Star is going to take you on, with it‚Äôs best ever in-game features.
Online ludo multiplayer game is a cool lodu game that is playable both on your desktop and on Ludo Multiplayer is one of our selected ludu & lodu star game.
Download Ludo All Star now! Master the ludo club and be a Ludo Star!

comments: It's a great VPN, WHEN IT WORKS! More often than not in my experience it tries to connect to a server, rather than actually doing it... Sometimes its instant and I'm filled with glee, however, 90% of the time I'm relogging, trying different servers, and just hoping to SOMEDAY connect to one!! I've tried all alternative options in "settings" to no avail. This happens with the paid version, which is why I'm very dissapointed. DO NOT BUY; if you experience this as well through the free trail.

NordVPN does not work with most streaming services. The company's position: "accessibility to the streaming services is an extra feature and we do not guarantee that you will always be able to access it with no issues 24/7." Even though they advertise that they offer uninterrupted streaming. So you have to disconnect, then reconnect, every time you wish to stream. They will respond by saying you should contact customer service. 2 chats, 4 emails later (ID #5305367)no change. Time for a new VPN.

Great VPN! If you are using on a Chromebook and you are using apps, then you need to install and activate the NordVPN app to be fully protected. There is a Chrome extension that protects the browser ONLY. It was easy to find the answer to this question on the FAQs by NordVPN. Some streaming services do not allow you to use their service (YouTube TV as of 3/2020) and NordVPN at the same time. Other apps that don't allow you to use NordVPN, also. I am concerned mostly about financial transactions.

Not very user friendly, I had to figure out by myself and totally by chance that I have to use obfuscated connection to successfully connect without being blocked. There is no users' guide provided,would be cool though,with every scenario to troubleshoot.And it's not working on my android tv box, leaving me stuck to the 8" tablet to watch movies. I'm not impressed. Tough luck that I got the 3 year subscription without testing the first year. The 3 stars would be for the price then.

So far so good. Expressvpn has left me with a useless 6 month subscription in China. It just won't connect and is slow as a snail when it does once and hour. Nord connected quickly and is good so far. I wish I'd spent the money here first but I had good luck with the other last time. I'll keep both just in case now.

title: Venmo
description:
Why use Venmo?

Because it‚Äôs the money app for splitting the cost of almost anything‚Äîright then, right there.
Because it makes settling up feel like catching up. 
Because you can add a note to each payment to remember the moments, not the money. 

What do people use Venmo for? Plenty of things, like:

Meals
Split the group dinner tab without the napkin math.

Rent
Transfer money to roomies for your share of rent and utilities.

Activities
Settle up for fun stuff like concert tix and road trips.

Still reading? We‚Äôll let you in on a little secret: we‚Äôre more than just a way to pay friends.
- We offer Venmo card, so you can shop with your Venmo balance everywhere Mastercard¬Æ is accepted in the U.S., plus earn cash back rewards at select retailers. Terms apply: https://venmo.com/rewards/
- Get your Venmo money in the bank, fast. Use Instant Transfer to get your cash in minutes using an eligible debit card or bank account.
- Check out with Venmo on some of your favorite apps, like Uber, StockX, Grubhub, and Zola.
- We‚Äôve got your back‚Äîsecurity is very important to us, and we prioritize making you feel safe and secure by taking security measures to protect your account. Plus, we‚Äôve got a stellar customer support team, ready to solve any issues.


Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC. Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circles design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated.
summary: Venmo is the fun and easy way to pay and get paid.
recentChanges: We worked on various improvements and bug fixes
comments: Exchanging money with people works great. Instant verification to add bank accounts has issues. On the last step where I'm supposed to choose which bank account to add, it's just blank. (Edit: when I made the above review, they replied with "It seems like you're having issues with the process" - no, your process has issues, I'm not doing anything wrong. Because of that response, I moved it from 3 stars to 2 stars).

This app is terrible. Their security is awful. Their response on trouble tickets is even worse. It also leaves you hanging to where you don't know if they even got your message. They can't do anything right. A couple months after I listed the comments above I tried to request funds from somebody and instead venmo sent them funds putting my account in the negative. I can not warn you enough, so not use this app it's terrible.

*update* Venmo solved my issue quickly. I appreciate their customer service and now I can use Venmo again! Woohoo!!* Tried to install the app but won't let me verify my phone number so I couldn't even get passed the registration part. Kept saying 404 error.

Needs to have: 1. More than one person should be able to use the same bank account, like a husband and wife with a shared account. 2 An option to verify the identify of the recepient - like sending a real-time ping or something. Last 4 digits of the phone number are okay, but wouldn't a real time ping verification be easier, especially for retail transactions?
Ease of use has greatly improved. A little leg-work is involved to link a bank account. Have your routing and account numbers on hand.

title: Roku
description:
Stream hundreds of hit movies, TV shows and more on the go with The Roku Channel, use it as a second remote, enjoy private listening, and more. 

The free Roku mobile app makes it easy and fun to control your Roku player and Roku TV‚Ñ¢.

Use the Roku mobile app to:
‚Ä¢ Control your Roku device as another remote
‚Ä¢ Stream hit movies, TV shows and more on the go with The Roku Channel 
‚Ä¢ Enjoy private listening* with headphones 
‚Ä¢ Use your voice or keyboard to search for movies, shows, actors, and directors
‚Ä¢ Cast videos, photos, and music to your TV 
‚Ä¢ Add and launch channels on your Roku device
‚Ä¢ Enter text on your Roku device easier with your keyboard


To use certain features of the Roku mobile app, you must connect your phone or tablet to the same wireless network as your Roku device. Certain features require a compatible Roku device, and may require logging in to your Roku account. 


Feature availability:
¬∑ Searching by voice is available in English in the US, UK, and Canada only.
¬∑ The Roku app is available in English only in Mexico.
* Mobile private listening is available for Roku Express, Express+, Roku Streaming Stick (3600, 3800, 3810), Roku Streaming Stick+, Roku Premiere, Roku Premiere+, Roku Ultra and Roku TVs.
** Subscription or other payment may be required to access certain channel content. Channel availability is subject to change and varies by country.

For more information and troubleshooting help, go to http://support.roku.com

comments: This app is pretty cool. Really have only one issue and that is when I open the text window and press the arrow(enter) button via Google onboard keyboard. What I expect to happen is the keyboard to disappear. If I tap anywhere outside the keyboard disappears. When you have time would you please and add a "X" box. Thanks in advance. MICHAEL

Me and my family loved the Roku, plenty of free shows, movies, reality TV, cartoons ECT. The bonus is the extra stuff you can subscribe to at a very low price. Turns out to be the cheapest non cable bill I'll ever have to pay and that's to get beneficial stuff! You know like recording, live television, and the best of the best of reality TV shows.

This is one of my favorite apps. I always lose my remotes and the roku app always works perfectly from literally anywhere in my house. So For example if I am on my back porch I can press play and my kids show will start. It's also really cool that you can stream the roku channel on your device with the app. I'm still kicking myself for buying a replacement remote last year before I knew about this app. It's so easy to use my three-year-old uses it to control his TV. Don't change a thing!

It's great when it works, the private listening feature is particularly useful and just what I was looking for. Unfortunately, it's buggy as hell and does not work most of the time. With private listening on the audio will often lag and sputter so much that eventually my phone will disconnect from the tv. No problems with connectivity when private listening is off, but that feature is basically my only use for the app. Sometimes sputtering audio will keep playing long after the video's paused.

If I could make use out of the private listening feature it would have been a 5 star rating for sure! I can't seem to figure out how to use it and if I even can use it in the way I hoped to use it. At night when my family is sleeping and I don't want to bother them with the TV volume too loud I thought that I could nix that problem with the private listening feature but doesn't seem to work that way. Without that 1 issue 5 stars would be there without question!üòû

title: Wordscapes
description:
Can you solve all the cross word puzzles? Even with unlimited tries it's a challenge!

This text twist of a word game is tremendous brain challenging fun. Enjoy modern word puzzles with the best of word searching, anagrams, and crosswords!

You‚Äôll never experience a dull moment after you try this addicting word puzzle game!  Play this crossword puzzle once and just you won‚Äôt be able to put it down.

‚û§ Escape and stimulate your mind by visiting the beautiful destinations of Wordscapes!
‚û§ Get your word hunt on with over 6,000 cross word puzzles!
‚û§ Challenge your brain and vocabulary ‚Äì this crossword puzzle starts easy and becomes challenging fast!
‚û§ Think you can beat these anagram word puzzles? They start simply but ramp up fast!

Wordscapes is the word hunt game that over 10 million people just can't stop playing! It's a perfect fit for fans of crossword or word anagram games, combining best of word find games and crossword puzzles.

The top-rated word game, from the makers of Word Stacks, Word Chums, Word Flowers, Word Mocha, Wordscapes Uncrossed, and Spell Blitz.

comments: I used to really love this game; absolutely adored it. I've been playing for over a year and am on level 1375 currently. Since the last couple updates (i'd guess since mid February), the game takes 4 solid minutes to load when I open it, and constantly freezes, forcing me to restart the app and wait those 4 minutes, over and over again. Yesterday I downloaded the most recent update, and now my game freezes only after a couple seconds of having it open. Sometimes it stays normal until I press a button, then it freezes. Please fix this! I love this game so much! I'm on a Samsung Galaxy Amp 2. Thank you for your time reading this.

It's good to pass the time, but it doesn't take too long to notice that there are often very Christian words mixed into the puzzles, which isn't necessarily a bad thing, but I think it should be advertised as so. It's just interesting to see what words the app decides are valid and invalid. I had to delete the app when "ants" wasn't an answer but "sin" was. Also, way too many ads of course.

Good, not great. LOTS of words are used very frequently, not a lot of variety. Difficulty doesn't seem to advance (I am on level 200) and the number of ads is annoying. Like 1 every 90 seconds or once you finish a game if it takes you longer than 90 seconds. The ads repeat over and over and over and over and over... Same ads, same "cannot wait for this to be over so I can get back to the basic challenge of the game" irritation. No apparent way to just buy out of the ads.

So the greed has finally caught up with PeopleFun! They're so money hungry that they have now started reducing game features to make way for ads. You can no longer see the extra words in the bottom left corner - it's now covered with a small banner ad. Besides this, the full screen ads are a lot more frequent now than they were before. Poor guys must be having financial difficulty. After having had this game for a long time, I will now be uninstalling. If it ain't broke, don't fix it you idiots!

This game is cool. I like it, but my problem is that my coins dont go to the appropriate position. See the piggy bank gets full. Then after, I complete a level with only 20 coins I can use. I get one coin and the rest bounce off the piggy bank. The worst part is that you have to buy the piggy bank to get the coins that you have earned. That's not cool. I dont have the money spend on coins that I have EARNED while playing and completing levels. I can deal with the ads but it's a RIP OFF.

title: Race the Traffic Moto
description:
Race the Traffic Moto takes bikes games to a whole new level. Have fun dodging cars and trucks while you speed up to the limit. Race against the AI in an outstanding Racing Face-Off and try to earn the respect of your fellow bikers. 
Enjoy the fun of driving the most amazing bike models in the world. You can get some custom bikes or even some older classics.
Race the Traffic Moto includes the most awesome feature in any bike game: Nitro Boost. Fill up your nitro by speeding and overtaking other cars and then use it to reach max speed. Also, you can get several bikes to improve your performance.

What are you waiting for? Download Race the Traffic Moto now!

Features:  

- 3 game modes.
- 6 amazing bikes to purchase.
- Excellent gameplay.
- Great 3D graphics.
- Lots of bike racing fun!

comments: Previously didn't get free stuff as videos weren't working. Have noticed a few other reviews say the same. My Internet fine. OK so I've just done another update. I don't like what you've done with the spin wheel. After watching a video to get a free spin you MUST now spin the wheel before it will let you watch another video for a free spin. I liked to save my spins up for when I really needed them like during quests - spin the wheel 3 times. Or when getting puzzle pieces. Please change back.

Major Glitches Lately Used to enjoy this game a lot but recently it doesnt give you the prizes you collect. Whenever it gives the option to watch a video the video won't play and you end up not getting the original prize. I've lost countless prize tokens needed to complete quests. I've tried to send feedback but that freezes every time. I've spent a lot of money on tokens which makes this even more disappointing.

I have spent the time and $$ to get more coins only to b left wanting. I am not sure if my emails requesting this issue be resolved are even getting thru. So, basically, this game is a waste of my time. No attempts have been made on their part to fix the problem & that doesn't set well with me. Good luck to the rest of you.

Would give zero stars right now. Major issues. Game will offer free items for watching videos but over 80% of the time it says "video not ready" so you end up with nothing. It will also offer double coins if you watch a video but when you click on the button it does nothing...no video...no extra coins. Loved this game at first but now just disappointed and frustrated with it. Have tried to send feedback through the game but it hangs up and says it us gathering state info and never goes through.

I enjoy it a lot, however the game play is hit or miss. Lately, when the bonuses appear on the right side of the screen and you go to click on them, most of the time they don't work. And.... when it is clickable, I'm met the with the "Video not teady" error message. Very frustrating. Hopefully, this gets fixed with a future update.
